◆ FillScript()

void SmartScript::FillScript ( SmartAIEventList  e,
WorldObject *  obj,
AreaTrigger const *  at 
)
5073{
5074 (void)at; // ensure that the variable is referenced even if extra logs are disabled in order to pass compiler checks
5075
5076 if (e.empty())
5077 {
5078 if (obj)
5079 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript: EventMap for Entry {} is empty but is using SmartScript.", obj->GetEntry());
5080
5081 if (at)
5082 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript: EventMap for AreaTrigger {} is empty but is using SmartScript.", at->entry);
5083 return;
5084 }
5085 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = e.begin(); i != e.end(); ++i)
5086 {
5087#ifndef ACORE_DEBUG
5088 if ((*i).event.event_flags & SMART_EVENT_FLAG_DEBUG_ONLY)
5089 continue;
5090#endif
5091
5092 if ((*i).event.event_flags & SMART_EVENT_FLAG_DIFFICULTY_ALL)//if has instance flag add only if in it
5093 {
5094 if (obj && obj->GetMap()->IsDungeon())
5095 {
5096 if ((1 << (obj->GetMap()->GetSpawnMode() + 1)) & (*i).event.event_flags)
5097 {
5098 mEvents.push_back((*i));
5099 }
5100 }
5101 continue;
5102 }
5103 mEvents.push_back((*i));//NOTE: 'world(0)' events still get processed in ANY instance mode
5104 }
5105}
LOG_DEBUG
#define LOG_DEBUG(filterType__,...)

◆ FindCreatureNear()

Creature * SmartScript::FindCreatureNear ( WorldObject *  searchObject,
ObjectGuid::LowType  guid 
) const
inline
152 {
153 auto bounds = searchObject->GetMap()->GetCreatureBySpawnIdStore().equal_range(guid);
154 if (bounds.first == bounds.second)
155 return nullptr;
156
157 auto creatureItr = std::find_if(bounds.first, bounds.second, [](Map::CreatureBySpawnIdContainer::value_type const& pair)
158 {
159 return pair.second->IsAlive();
160 });
161
162 return creatureItr != bounds.second ? creatureItr->second : bounds.first->second;
163 }
Map::GetCreatureBySpawnIdStore

Definition Map.h:367

References Map::GetCreatureBySpawnIdStore(), and WorldObject::GetMap().

◆ FindLinkedEvent()

std::optional< std::reference_wrapper< SmartScriptHolder > > SmartScript::FindLinkedEvent ( uint32  link)
inlineprivate
268 {
269 if (!mEvents.empty())
270 {
271 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = mEvents.begin(); i != mEvents.end(); ++i)
272 {
273 if (i->event_id == link)
274 {
275 return std::ref(*i);
276 }
277 }
278 }
279 return std::nullopt;
280 }

◆ GetCounterValue()

uint32 SmartScript::GetCounterValue ( uint32  id)
inline
135 {

◆ GetLastInvoker()

WorldObject * SmartScript::GetLastInvoker ( WorldObject *  invoker = nullptr) const
5332{
5333 // Xinef: Look for invoker only on map of base object... Prevents multithreaded crashes
5334 if (GetBaseObject())
5335 return ObjectAccessor::GetWorldObject(*GetBaseObject(), mLastInvoker);
5336 // xinef: used for area triggers invoker cast
5337 else if (invoker)
5338 return ObjectAccessor::GetWorldObject(*invoker, mLastInvoker);
5339 return nullptr;
5340}

◆ GetScript()

void SmartScript::GetScript ( )
5108{
5109 SmartAIEventList e;
5110 if (me)
5111 {
5112 e = sSmartScriptMgr->GetScript(-((int32)me->GetSpawnId()), mScriptType);
5113 if (e.empty())
5114 e = sSmartScriptMgr->GetScript((int32)me->GetEntry(), mScriptType);
5115
5116 FillScript(e, me, nullptr);
5117
5118 if (CreatureTemplate const* cInfo = me->GetCreatureTemplate())
5119 {
5120 if (cInfo->HasFlagsExtra(CREATURE_FLAG_EXTRA_DONT_OVERRIDE_ENTRY_SAI))
5121 {
5122 e = sSmartScriptMgr->GetScript((int32)me->GetEntry(), mScriptType);
5123 FillScript(e, me, nullptr);
5124 }
5125 }
5126 }
5127 else if (go)
5128 {
5129 e = sSmartScriptMgr->GetScript(-((int32)go->GetSpawnId()), mScriptType);
5130 if (e.empty())
5131 e = sSmartScriptMgr->GetScript((int32)go->GetEntry(), mScriptType);
5132 FillScript(e, go, nullptr);
5133 }
5134 else if (trigger)
5135 {
5136 e = sSmartScriptMgr->GetScript((int32)trigger->entry, mScriptType);
5137 FillScript(e, nullptr, trigger);
5138 }
5139}

◆ GetStoredTargetVector()

ObjectVector const * SmartScript::GetStoredTargetVector ( uint32  id,

) const

101 {
102 auto itr = _storedTargets.find(id);
103 if (itr != _storedTargets.end())

◆ GetTargets()

void SmartScript::GetTargets ( ObjectVector &  targets,
SmartScriptHolder const &  e,
WorldObject *  invoker = nullptr 
) const
3438{
3439 WorldObject* scriptTrigger = nullptr;
3440 if (invoker)
3441 scriptTrigger = invoker;
3442 else if (WorldObject* tempLastInvoker = GetLastInvoker())
3443 scriptTrigger = tempLastInvoker;
3444
3445 WorldObject* baseObject = GetBaseObject();
3446
3447 switch (e.GetTargetType())
3448 {
3449 case SMART_TARGET_SELF:
3450 if (baseObject)
3451 targets.push_back(baseObject);
3452 break;
3453 case SMART_TARGET_VICTIM:
3454 if (me)
3455 if (Unit* victim = me->GetVictim())
3456 targets.push_back(victim);
3457 break;
3458 case SMART_TARGET_HOSTILE_SECOND_AGGRO:
3459 if (me)
3460 {
3461 if (e.target.hostileRandom.powerType)
3462 {
3463 if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::MaxThreat, 1, PowerUsersSelector(me, Powers(e.target.hostileRandom.powerType - 1), (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly)))
3464 targets.push_back(u);
3465 }
3466 else if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::MaxThreat, 1, (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly, true, -e.target.hostileRandom.aura))
3467 targets.push_back(u);
3468 }
3469 break;
3470 case SMART_TARGET_HOSTILE_LAST_AGGRO:
3471 if (me)
3472 {
3473 if (e.target.hostileRandom.powerType)
3474 {
3475 if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::MinThreat, 0, PowerUsersSelector(me, Powers(e.target.hostileRandom.powerType - 1), (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly)))
3476 targets.push_back(u);
3477 }
3478 else if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::MinThreat, 0, (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly, true, -e.target.hostileRandom.aura))
3479 targets.push_back(u);
3480 }
3481 break;
3482 case SMART_TARGET_HOSTILE_RANDOM:
3483 if (me)
3484 {
3485 if (e.target.hostileRandom.powerType)
3486 {
3487 if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::Random, 0, PowerUsersSelector(me, Powers(e.target.hostileRandom.powerType - 1), (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly)))
3488 targets.push_back(u);
3489 }
3490 else if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::Random, 0, (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly, true, -e.target.hostileRandom.aura))
3491 targets.push_back(u);
3492 }
3493 break;
3494 case SMART_TARGET_HOSTILE_RANDOM_NOT_TOP:
3495 if (me)
3496 {
3497 if (e.target.hostileRandom.powerType)
3498 {
3499 if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::Random, 1, PowerUsersSelector(me, Powers(e.target.hostileRandom.powerType - 1), (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly)))
3500 targets.push_back(u);
3501 }
3502 else if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::Random, 1, (float)e.target.hostileRandom.maxDist, e.target.hostileRandom.playerOnly, true, -e.target.hostileRandom.aura))
3503 targets.push_back(u);
3504 }
3505 break;
3506 case SMART_TARGET_FARTHEST:
3507 if (me)
3508 {
3509 if (Unit* u = me->AI()->SelectTarget(SelectTargetMethod::MinDistance, 0, FarthestTargetSelector(me, e.target.farthest.maxDist, e.target.farthest.playerOnly, e.target.farthest.isInLos, e.target.farthest.minDist)))
3510 targets.push_back(u);
3511 }
3512 break;
3513 case SMART_TARGET_ACTION_INVOKER:
3514 if (scriptTrigger)
3515 targets.push_back(scriptTrigger);
3516 break;
3517 case SMART_TARGET_ACTION_INVOKER_VEHICLE:
3518 if (scriptTrigger && IsUnit(scriptTrigger))
3519 if (scriptTrigger->ToUnit()->GetVehicle() && scriptTrigger->ToUnit()->GetVehicle()->GetBase())
3520 targets.push_back(scriptTrigger->ToUnit()->GetVehicle()->GetBase());
3521 break;
3522 case SMART_TARGET_INVOKER_PARTY:
3523 if (scriptTrigger)
3524 {
3525 if (Player* player = scriptTrigger->ToPlayer())
3526 {
3527 if (Group* group = player->GetGroup())
3528 {
3529 for (GroupReference* groupRef = group->GetFirstMember(); groupRef != nullptr; groupRef = groupRef->next())
3530 if (Player* member = groupRef->GetSource())
3531 {
3532 if (member->IsInMap(player))
3533 targets.push_back(member);
3534
3535 if (e.target.invokerParty.includePets)
3536 if (Creature* pet = ObjectAccessor::GetCreatureOrPetOrVehicle(*member, member->GetPetGUID()))
3537 if (pet->IsPet() && pet->IsInMap(player))
3538 targets.push_back(pet);
3539 }
3540 }
3541 // We still add the player to the list if there is no group. If we do
3542 // this even if there is a group (thus the else-check), it will add the
3543 // same player to the list twice. We don't want that to happen.
3544 else
3545 targets.push_back(scriptTrigger);
3546 }
3547 }
3548 break;
3549 case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_RANGE:
3550 {
3551 WorldObject* ref = baseObject;
3552 if (!ref)
3553 ref = scriptTrigger;
3554
3555 if (!ref)
3556 {
3557 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_RANGE: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker",
3558 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
3559 break;
3560 }
3561
3562 ObjectVector units;
3563 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.unitRange.maxDist));
3564
3565 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
3566 {
3567 if (!IsCreature(unit))
3568 continue;
3569
3570 if (me && me->GetGUID() == unit->GetGUID())
3571 continue;
3572
3573 // check alive state - 1 alive, 2 dead, 0 both
3574 if (uint32 state = e.target.unitRange.livingState)
3575 {
3576 if (unit->ToCreature()->IsAlive() && state == 2)
3577 continue;
3578 if (!unit->ToCreature()->IsAlive() && state == 1)
3579 continue;
3580 }
3581
3582 if (((e.target.unitRange.creature && unit->ToCreature()->GetEntry() == e.target.unitRange.creature) || !e.target.unitRange.creature) && ref->IsInRange(unit, (float)e.target.unitRange.minDist, (float)e.target.unitRange.maxDist))
3583 targets.push_back(unit);
3584 }
3585
3586 break;
3587 }
3588 case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_DISTANCE:
3589 {
3590 ObjectVector units;
3591 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.unitDistance.dist));
3592
3593 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
3594 {
3595 if (!IsCreature(unit))
3596 continue;
3597
3598 if (me && me->GetGUID() == unit->GetGUID())
3599 continue;
3600
3601 // check alive state - 1 alive, 2 dead, 0 both
3602 if (uint32 state = e.target.unitDistance.livingState)
3603 {
3604 if (unit->ToCreature()->IsAlive() && state == 2)
3605 continue;
3606 if (!unit->ToCreature()->IsAlive() && state == 1)
3607 continue;
3608 }
3609
3610 if ((e.target.unitDistance.creature && unit->ToCreature()->GetEntry() == e.target.unitDistance.creature) || !e.target.unitDistance.creature)
3611 targets.push_back(unit);
3612 }
3613
3614 break;
3615 }
3616 case SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_DISTANCE:
3617 {
3618 ObjectVector units;
3619 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.goDistance.dist));
3620
3621 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
3622 {
3623 if (!IsGameObject(unit))
3624 continue;
3625
3626 if (go && go->GetGUID() == unit->GetGUID())
3627 continue;
3628
3629 if ((e.target.goDistance.entry && unit->ToGameObject()->GetEntry() == e.target.goDistance.entry) || !e.target.goDistance.entry)
3630 targets.push_back(unit);
3631 }
3632
3633 break;
3634 }
3635 case SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_RANGE:
3636 {
3637
3638 WorldObject* ref = baseObject;
3639 if (!ref)
3640 ref = scriptTrigger;
3641
3642 if (!ref)
3643 {
3644 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_RANGE: Entry: {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker.",
3645 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
3646 break;
3647 }
3648
3649 ObjectVector units;
3650 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.goRange.maxDist));
3651
3652 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
3653 {
3654 if (!IsGameObject(unit))
3655 continue;
3656
3657 if (go && go->GetGUID() == unit->GetGUID())
3658 continue;
3659
3660 if (((e.target.goRange.entry && IsGameObject(unit) && unit->ToGameObject()->GetEntry() == e.target.goRange.entry) || !e.target.goRange.entry) && ref->IsInRange((unit), (float)e.target.goRange.minDist, (float)e.target.goRange.maxDist))
3661 targets.push_back(unit);
3662 }
3663
3664 break;
3665 }
3666 case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_GUID:
3667 {
3668 if (!scriptTrigger && !baseObject)
3669 {
3670 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_GUID: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker.",
3671 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
3672 break;
3673 }
3674
3675 Creature* target = FindCreatureNear(scriptTrigger ? scriptTrigger : GetBaseObject(), e.target.unitGUID.dbGuid);
3676 if (target && (!e.target.unitGUID.entry || target->GetEntry() == e.target.unitGUID.entry))
3677 targets.push_back(target);
3678 break;
3679 }
3680 case SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_GUID:
3681 {
3682 if (!scriptTrigger && !GetBaseObject())
3683 {
3684 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_GUID: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker.",
3685 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
3686 break;
3687 }
3688
3689 GameObject* target = FindGameObjectNear(scriptTrigger ? scriptTrigger : GetBaseObject(), e.target.goGUID.dbGuid);
3690 if (target && (!e.target.goGUID.entry || target->GetEntry() == e.target.goGUID.entry))
3691 targets.push_back(target);
3692 break;
3693 }
3694 case SMART_TARGET_PLAYER_RANGE:
3695 {
3696 ObjectVector units;
3697 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.playerRange.maxDist));
3698
3699 if (!units.empty() && baseObject)
3700 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
3701 if (IsPlayer(unit) && baseObject->IsInRange(unit, float(e.target.playerRange.minDist), float(e.target.playerRange.maxDist)))
3702 targets.push_back(unit);
3703 if (e.target.playerRange.maxCount)
3704 Acore::Containers::RandomResize(targets, e.target.playerRange.maxCount);
3705 break;
3706 }
3707 case SMART_TARGET_PLAYER_DISTANCE:
3708 {
3709 ObjectVector units;
3710 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.playerDistance.dist));
3711
3712 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
3713 if (IsPlayer(unit))
3714 targets.push_back(unit);
3715 break;
3716 }
3717 case SMART_TARGET_STORED:
3718 {
3719 WorldObject* ref = baseObject;
3720 if (!ref)
3721 ref = scriptTrigger;
3722
3723 if (!ref)
3724 {
3725 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_STORED: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker.",
3726 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
3727 break;
3728 }
3729
3730 if (ObjectVector const* stored = GetStoredTargetVector(e.target.stored.id, *ref))
3731 targets.assign(stored->begin(), stored->end());
3732 break;
3733 }
3734 case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_CREATURE:
3735 {
3736 WorldObject* ref = baseObject;
3737
3738 if (!ref)
3739 ref = scriptTrigger;
3740
3741 if (!ref)
3742 {
3743 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_CREATURE: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker.",
3744 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
3745 break;
3746 }
3747
3748 Creature* target = GetClosestCreatureWithEntry(ref, e.target.unitClosest.entry, (float)(e.target.unitClosest.dist ? e.target.unitClosest.dist : 100), !e.target.unitClosest.dead);
3749 if (target)
3750 targets.push_back(target);
3751 break;
3752 }
3753 case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_GAMEOBJECT:
3754 {
3755 WorldObject* ref = baseObject;
3756
3757 if (!ref)
3758 ref = scriptTrigger;
3759
3760 if (!ref)
3761 {
3762 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_GAMEOBJECT: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker.",
3763 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
3764 break;
3765 }
3766
3767 GameObject* target = GetClosestGameObjectWithEntry(ref, e.target.goClosest.entry, (float)(e.target.goClosest.dist ? e.target.goClosest.dist : 100), e.target.goClosest.onlySpawned);
3768 if (target)
3769 targets.push_back(target);
3770 break;
3771 }
3772 case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_PLAYER:
3773 {
3774 WorldObject* ref = baseObject;
3775
3776 if (!ref)
3777 ref = scriptTrigger;
3778
3779 if (!ref)
3780 {
3781 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_PLAYER: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} is missing base object or invoker.",
3782 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
3783 break;
3784 }
3785
3786 if (Player* target = ref->SelectNearestPlayer((float)e.target.playerDistance.dist))
3787 targets.push_back(target);
3788 break;
3789 }
3790 case SMART_TARGET_OWNER_OR_SUMMONER:
3791 /*
3792 * Owners/Summoners should be WorldObjects. This allows to have other objects
3793 * such as gameobjects to execute SmartScripts using this type of target.
3794 * Otherwise, only Units like creatures can summon other creatures.
3795 */
3796 {
3797 if (me)
3798 {
3799 if (WorldObject* owner = ObjectAccessor::GetWorldObject(*me, me->GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID()))
3800 {
3801 targets.push_back(owner);
3802 }
3803 else if (me->IsSummon() && me->ToTempSummon()->GetSummonerUnit())
3804 {
3805 targets.push_back(me->ToTempSummon()->GetSummonerUnit());
3806 }
3807 }
3808 else if (go)
3809 {
3810 if (WorldObject* owner = ObjectAccessor::GetWorldObject(*go, go->GetOwnerGUID()))
3811 {
3812 targets.push_back(owner);
3813 }
3814 }
3815
3816 // xinef: Get owner of owner
3817 if (e.target.owner.useCharmerOrOwner && !targets.empty())
3818 {
3819 if (WorldObject* owner = targets.front())
3820 {
3821 targets.clear();
3822
3823 if (owner->ToCreature())
3824 {
3825 if (Unit* base = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*owner, owner->ToCreature()->GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID()))
3826 {
3827 targets.push_back(base);
3828 }
3829 }
3830 else
3831 {
3832 if (Unit* base = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*owner, owner->ToGameObject()->GetOwnerGUID()))
3833 {
3834 targets.push_back(base);
3835 }
3836 }
3837 }
3838 }
3839 break;
3840 }
3841 case SMART_TARGET_THREAT_LIST:
3842 {
3843 if (me)
3844 {
3845 ThreatContainer::StorageType threatList = me->GetThreatMgr().GetThreatList();
3846 for (ThreatContainer::StorageType::const_iterator i = threatList.begin(); i != threatList.end(); ++i)
3847 if (Unit* temp = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*me, (*i)->getUnitGuid()))
3848 // Xinef: added distance check
3849 if (e.target.threatList.maxDist == 0 || me->IsWithinCombatRange(temp, (float)e.target.threatList.maxDist))
3850 targets.push_back(temp);
3851 }
3852 break;
3853 }
3854 case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_ENEMY:
3855 {
3856 if (me)
3857 if (Unit* target = me->SelectNearestTarget(e.target.closestAttackable.maxDist, e.target.closestAttackable.playerOnly))
3858 targets.push_back(target);
3859
3860 break;
3861 }
3862 case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_FRIENDLY:
3863 {
3864 if (me)
3865 if (Unit* target = DoFindClosestFriendlyInRange(e.target.closestFriendly.maxDist, e.target.closestFriendly.playerOnly))
3866 targets.push_back(target);
3867
3868 break;
3869 }
3870 case SMART_TARGET_PLAYER_WITH_AURA:
3871 {
3872 ObjectVector units;
3873 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.playerDistance.dist));
3874
3875 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
3876 if (IsPlayer(unit) && unit->ToPlayer()->IsAlive() && !unit->ToPlayer()->IsGameMaster())
3877 if (GetBaseObject()->IsInRange(unit, (float)e.target.playerWithAura.distMin, (float)e.target.playerWithAura.distMax))
3878 if (bool(e.target.playerWithAura.negation) != unit->ToPlayer()->HasAura(e.target.playerWithAura.spellId))
3879 targets.push_back(unit);
3880
3881 if (e.target.o > 0)
3882 Acore::Containers::RandomResize(targets, e.target.o);
3883
3884 break;
3885 }
3886 case SMART_TARGET_ROLE_SELECTION:
3887 {
3888 ObjectVector units;
3889 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.playerDistance.dist));
3890 // 1 = Tanks, 2 = Healer, 4 = Damage
3891 uint32 roleMask = e.target.roleSelection.roleMask;
3892 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
3893 if (Player* targetPlayer = unit->ToPlayer())
3894 if (targetPlayer->IsAlive() && !targetPlayer->IsGameMaster())
3895 {
3896 if (roleMask & SMART_TARGET_ROLE_FLAG_TANKS)
3897 {
3898 if (targetPlayer->HasTankSpec())
3899 {
3900 targets.push_back(unit);
3901 continue;
3902 }
3903 }
3904 if (roleMask & SMART_TARGET_ROLE_FLAG_HEALERS)
3905 {
3906 if (targetPlayer->HasHealSpec())
3907 {
3908 targets.push_back(unit);
3909 continue;
3910 }
3911 }
3912 if (roleMask & SMART_TARGET_ROLE_FLAG_DAMAGERS)
3913 {
3914 if (targetPlayer->HasCasterSpec() || targetPlayer->HasMeleeSpec())
3915 {
3916 targets.push_back(unit);
3917 continue;
3918 }
3919 }
3920 }
3921
3922 if (e.target.roleSelection.resize > 0)
3923 Acore::Containers::RandomResize(targets, e.target.roleSelection.resize);
3924
3925 break;
3926 }
3927 case SMART_TARGET_VEHICLE_PASSENGER:
3928 {
3929 if (me && me->IsVehicle())
3930 {
3931 if (Unit* target = me->GetVehicleKit()->GetPassenger(e.target.vehicle.seatMask))
3932 {
3933 targets.push_back(target);
3934 }
3935 }
3936 break;
3937 }
3938 case SMART_TARGET_LOOT_RECIPIENTS:
3939 {
3940 if (me)
3941 {
3942 if (Group* lootGroup = me->GetLootRecipientGroup())
3943 {
3944 for (GroupReference* it = lootGroup->GetFirstMember(); it != nullptr; it = it->next())
3945 {
3946 if (Player* recipient = it->GetSource())
3947 {
3948 targets.push_back(recipient);
3949 }
3950 }
3951 }
3952 else
3953 {
3954 if (Player* recipient = me->GetLootRecipient())
3955 {
3956 targets.push_back(recipient);
3957 }
3958 }
3959 }
3960 break;
3961 }
3962 case SMART_TARGET_SUMMONED_CREATURES:
3963 {
3964 if (me)
3965 {
3966 for (ObjectGuid const& guid : _summonList)
3967 {
3968 if (!e.target.summonedCreatures.entry || guid.GetEntry() == e.target.summonedCreatures.entry)
3969 {
3970 if (Creature* creature = me->GetMap()->GetCreature(guid))
3971 {
3972 targets.push_back(creature);
3973 }
3974 }
3975 }
3976 }
3977 break;
3978 }
3979 case SMART_TARGET_INSTANCE_STORAGE:
3980 {
3981 if (InstanceScript* instance = GetBaseObject()->GetInstanceScript())
3982 {
3983 if (e.target.instanceStorage.type == 1)
3984 {
3985 if (Creature* creature = instance->GetCreature(e.target.instanceStorage.index))
3986 {
3987 targets.push_back(creature);
3988 }
3989 }
3990 else if (e.target.instanceStorage.type == 2)
3991 {
3992 if (GameObject* go = instance->GetGameObject(e.target.instanceStorage.index))
3993 {
3994 targets.push_back(go);
3995 }
3996 }
3997 }
3998 else
3999 {
4000 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SMART_TARGET_INSTANCE_STORAGE: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} Target {} called outside an instance map.",
4001 e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType(), e.GetTargetType());
4002 }
4003
4004 break;
4005 }
4006 case SMART_TARGET_NONE:
4007 case SMART_TARGET_POSITION:
4008 default:
4009 break;
4010 }
4011}
uint32
std::uint32_t uint32

void SmartScript::InitTimer ( SmartScriptHolder &  e)

4816{
4817 switch (e.GetEventType())
4818 {
4819 //set only events which have initial timers
4820 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_PLAYERS:
4821 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_PLAYERS_NEGATION:
4822 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.nearPlayer.firstTimer, e.event.nearPlayer.firstTimer);
4823 break;
4824 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE:
4825 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC:
4826 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_OOC:
4827 case SMART_EVENT_RANGE:
4828 case SMART_EVENT_AREA_RANGE:
4829 case SMART_EVENT_AREA_CASTING:

4840 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_UNIT_NEGATION:
4841 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.nearUnit.timer, e.event.nearUnit.timer);
4842 break;
4843 default:
4844 e.active = true;
4845 break;
4846 }

◆ InstallTemplate()

void SmartScript::InstallTemplate ( SmartScriptHolder const &  e)
3326{
3327 if (!GetBaseObject())
3328 return;
3329 if (mTemplate != SMARTAI_TEMPLATE_BASIC)
3330 {
3331 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript::InstallTemplate: Entry {} SourceType {} AI Template can not be set more then once, skipped.", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType());
3332 return;
3333 }
3334 mTemplate = (SMARTAI_TEMPLATE)e.action.installTtemplate.id;
3335 switch ((SMARTAI_TEMPLATE)e.action.installTtemplate.id)
3336 {
3337 case SMARTAI_TEMPLATE_CASTER:
3338 {
3339 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC, 0, 0, 0, e.action.installTtemplate.param2, e.action.installTtemplate.param3, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_CAST, e.action.installTtemplate.param1, e.target.raw.param1, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_VICTIM, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1);
3340 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_RANGE, 0, e.action.installTtemplate.param4, 300, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_ALLOW_COMBAT_MOVEMENT, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1);
3341 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_RANGE, 0, 0, e.action.installTtemplate.param4 > 10 ? e.action.installTtemplate.param4 - 10 : 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_ALLOW_COMBAT_MOVEMENT, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1);
3342 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_MANA_PCT, 0, e.action.installTtemplate.param5 - 15 > 100 ? 100 : e.action.installTtemplate.param5 + 15, 100, 1000, 1000, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_SET_EVENT_PHASE, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
3343 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_MANA_PCT, 0, 0, e.action.installTtemplate.param5, 1000, 1000, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_SET_EVENT_PHASE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
3344 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_MANA_PCT, 0, 0, e.action.installTtemplate.param5, 1000, 1000, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_ALLOW_COMBAT_MOVEMENT, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
3345 break;
3346 }
3347 case SMARTAI_TEMPLATE_TURRET:
3348 {
3349 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC, 0, 0, 0, e.action.installTtemplate.param2, e.action.installTtemplate.param3, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_CAST, e.action.installTtemplate.param1, e.target.raw.param1, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_VICTIM, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
3350 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_JUST_CREATED, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_ALLOW_COMBAT_MOVEMENT, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
3351 break;
3352 }
3353 case SMARTAI_TEMPLATE_CAGED_NPC_PART:
3354 {
3355 if (!me)
3356 return;
3357 //store cage as id1
3358 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_DATA_SET, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_STORE_TARGET_LIST, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_GAMEOBJECT, e.action.installTtemplate.param1, 10, 0, 0, 0);
3359
3360 //reset(close) cage on hostage(me) respawn
3361 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_UPDATE, SMART_EVENT_FLAG_NOT_REPEATABLE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_RESET_GOBJECT, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_DISTANCE, e.action.installTtemplate.param1, 5, 0, 0, 0);
3362
3363 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_DATA_SET, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_SET_RUN, e.action.installTtemplate.param3, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
3364 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_DATA_SET, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_SET_EVENT_PHASE, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
3365
3366 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_UPDATE, SMART_EVENT_FLAG_NOT_REPEATABLE, 1000, 1000, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_MOVE_FORWARD, e.action.installTtemplate.param4, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1);
3367 //phase 1: give quest credit on movepoint reached
3368 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_MOVEMENTINFORM, 0, POINT_MOTION_TYPE, SMART_RANDOM_POINT, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_SET_DATA, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_STORED, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1);
3369 //phase 1: despawn after time on movepoint reached
3370 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_MOVEMENTINFORM, 0, POINT_MOTION_TYPE, SMART_RANDOM_POINT, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_FORCE_DESPAWN, e.action.installTtemplate.param2, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1);
3371
3372 if (sCreatureTextMgr->TextExist(me->GetEntry(), (uint8)e.action.installTtemplate.param5))
3373 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_MOVEMENTINFORM, 0, POINT_MOTION_TYPE, SMART_RANDOM_POINT, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_TALK, e.action.installTtemplate.param5, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1);
3374 break;
3375 }
3376 case SMARTAI_TEMPLATE_CAGED_GO_PART:
3377 {
3378 if (!go)
3379 return;
3380 //store hostage as id1
3381 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_GO_STATE_CHANGED, 0, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_STORE_TARGET_LIST, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_CREATURE, e.action.installTtemplate.param1, 10, 0, 0, 0);
3382 //store invoker as id2
3383 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_GO_STATE_CHANGED, 0, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_STORE_TARGET_LIST, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
3384 //signal hostage
3385 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_GO_STATE_CHANGED, 0, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_SET_DATA, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_STORED, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);
3386 //when hostage raeched end point, give credit to invoker
3387 if (e.action.installTtemplate.param2)
3388 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_DATA_SET, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_CALL_KILLEDMONSTER, e.action.installTtemplate.param1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_STORED, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0);
3389 else
3390 AddEvent(SMART_EVENT_GO_STATE_CHANGED, 0, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_CALL_KILLEDMONSTER, e.action.installTtemplate.param1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_TARGET_STORED, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0);
3391 break;
3392 }
3393 case SMARTAI_TEMPLATE_BASIC:
3394 default:
3395 return;
3396 }
3397}

◆ IsSmart() [2/3]

bool SmartScript::IsSmart ( Creature *  c,
bool  silent = false 
) const
70{
71 if (!c)
72 return false;
73
74 bool smart = true;
75 if (!dynamic_cast<SmartAI*>(c->AI()))
76 smart = false;
77
78 if (!smart && !silent)
79 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Action target Creature(entry: {}) is not using SmartAI, action skipped to prevent crash.", c ? c->GetEntry() : (me ? me->GetEntry() : 0));
80
81 return smart;
82}

◆ IsSmart() [3/3]

bool SmartScript::IsSmart ( GameObject *  g,
bool  silent = false 
) const
85{
86 if (!g)
87 return false;
88
89 bool smart = true;
90 if (!dynamic_cast<SmartGameObjectAI*>(g->AI()))
91 smart = false;
92
93 if (!smart && !silent)
94 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Action target GameObject(entry: {}) is not using SmartGameObjectAI, action skipped to prevent crash.", g ? g->GetEntry() : (go ? go->GetEntry() : 0));
95
96 return smart;
97}

◆ OnInitialize()

void SmartScript::OnInitialize ( WorldObject *  obj,
AreaTrigger const *  at = nullptr 
)
5142{
5143 if (obj)//handle object based scripts
5144 {
5145 switch (obj->GetTypeId())
5146 {
5147 case TYPEID_UNIT:
5148 mScriptType = SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_CREATURE;
5149 me = obj->ToCreature();
5150 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::OnInitialize: source is Creature {}", me->GetEntry());
5151 break;
5152 case TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT:
5153 mScriptType = SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT;
5154 go = obj->ToGameObject();
5155 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::OnInitialize: source is GameObject {}", go->GetEntry());
5156 break;
5157 default:
5158 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript::OnInitialize: Unhandled TypeID !WARNING!");
5159 return;
5160 }
5161 }
5162 else if (at)
5163 {
5164 mScriptType = SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_AREATRIGGER;
5165 trigger = at;
5166 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::OnInitialize: source is AreaTrigger {}", trigger->entry);
5167 }
5168 else
5169 {
5170 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript::OnInitialize: !WARNING! Initialized objects are nullptr.");
5171 return;
5172 }
5173
5174 GetScript();//load copy of script
5175
5176 for (SmartScriptHolder& event : mEvents)
5177 InitTimer(event);//calculate timers for first time use
5178
5179 ProcessEventsFor(SMART_EVENT_AI_INIT);
5180 InstallEvents();
5181 ProcessEventsFor(SMART_EVENT_JUST_CREATED);
5182}

◆ OnReset()

void SmartScript::OnReset ( )
110{
111 // xinef: check if we allow phase reset
112 if (AllowPhaseReset())
113 SetPhase(0);
114
115 ResetBaseObject();
116 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = mEvents.begin(); i != mEvents.end(); ++i)
117 {
118 if (!((*i).event.event_flags & SMART_EVENT_FLAG_DONT_RESET))
119 {
120 InitTimer((*i));
121 (*i).runOnce = false;
122 }
123
124 if ((*i).priority != SmartScriptHolder::DEFAULT_PRIORITY)
125 {
126 (*i).priority = SmartScriptHolder::DEFAULT_PRIORITY;
127 mEventSortingRequired = true;
128 }
129 }
130 ProcessEventsFor(SMART_EVENT_RESET);
131 mLastInvoker.Clear();
132 mCounterList.clear();
133}

◆ OnUpdate()

void SmartScript::OnUpdate ( const uint32  diff)
4978{
4979 if ((mScriptType == SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_CREATURE || mScriptType == SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT) && !GetBaseObject())
4980 return;
4981
4982 InstallEvents();//before UpdateTimers
4983
4984 if (mEventSortingRequired)
4985 {
4986 SortEvents(mEvents);
4987 mEventSortingRequired = false;
4988 }
4989
4990 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = mEvents.begin(); i != mEvents.end(); ++i)
4991 UpdateTimer(*i, diff);
4992
4993 if (!mStoredEvents.empty())
4994 {
4995 SmartAIEventStoredList::iterator i, icurr;
4996 for (i = mStoredEvents.begin(); i != mStoredEvents.end();)
4997 {
4998 icurr = i++;
4999 UpdateTimer(*icurr, diff);
5000 }
5001 }
5002
5003 bool needCleanup = true;
5004 if (!mTimedActionList.empty())
5005 {
5006 isProcessingTimedActionList = true;
5007 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = mTimedActionList.begin(); i != mTimedActionList.end(); ++i)
5008 {
5009 if ((*i).enableTimed)
5010 {
5011 UpdateTimer(*i, diff);
5012 needCleanup = false;
5013 }
5014 }
5015
5016 isProcessingTimedActionList = false;
5017 }
5018 if (needCleanup)
5019 mTimedActionList.clear();
5020
5021 if (!mRemIDs.empty())
5022 {
5023 for (std::list<uint32>::const_iterator i = mRemIDs.begin(); i != mRemIDs.end(); ++i)
5024 RemoveStoredEvent(*i);
5025
5026 // xinef: clear list after cleaning...
5027 mRemIDs.clear();
5028 }
5029 if (mUseTextTimer && me)
5030 {
5031 if (mTextTimer < diff)
5032 {
5033 uint32 textID = mLastTextID;
5034 mLastTextID = 0;
5035 uint32 entry = mTalkerEntry;
5036 mTalkerEntry = 0;
5037 mTextTimer = 0;
5038 mUseTextTimer = false;
5039 ProcessEventsFor(SMART_EVENT_TEXT_OVER, nullptr, textID, entry);
5040 }
5041 else mTextTimer -= diff;
5042 }
5043}
SMART_EVENT_TEXT_OVER
@ SMART_EVENT_TEXT_OVER
Definition SmartScriptMgr.h:170

void UpdateTimer(SmartScriptHolder &e, uint32 const diff)
Definition SmartScript.cpp:4855

void SortEvents(SmartAIEventList &events)

◆ ProcessAction()

void SmartScript::ProcessAction ( SmartScriptHolder &  e,
Unit *  unit = nullptr,
uint32  var0 = 0,
uint32  var1 = 0,
bool  bvar = false,
SpellInfo const *  spell = nullptr,
GameObject *  gob = nullptr 
)
164{
165 e.runOnce = true;//used for repeat check
166
167 //calc random
168 if (e.event.event_chance < 100 && e.event.event_chance && !(e.event.event_flags & SMART_EVENT_FLAG_TEMP_IGNORE_CHANCE_ROLL))
169 {
170 uint32 rnd = urand(1, 100);
171 if (e.event.event_chance <= rnd)
172 return;
173 }
174
175 // Remove SMART_EVENT_FLAG_TEMP_IGNORE_CHANCE_ROLL flag after processing roll chances as it's not needed anymore
176 e.event.event_flags &= ~SMART_EVENT_FLAG_TEMP_IGNORE_CHANCE_ROLL;
177
178 if (unit)
179 mLastInvoker = unit->GetGUID();
180 else if (gob)
181 mLastInvoker = gob->GetGUID();
182
183 if (WorldObject* tempInvoker = GetLastInvoker())
184 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: Invoker: {} ({})", tempInvoker->GetName(), tempInvoker->GetGUID().ToString());
185
186 bool isControlled = e.action.moveToPos.controlled > 0;
187
188 ObjectVector targets;
189 WorldObject* invoker = nullptr;
190 if (unit)
191 invoker = unit;
192 else if (gob)
193 invoker = gob;
194
195 GetTargets(targets, e, invoker);
196
197 switch (e.GetActionType())
198 {
199 case SMART_ACTION_TALK:
200 {
201 Creature* talker = e.target.type == 0 ? me : nullptr;
202 WorldObject* talkTarget = nullptr;
203
204 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
205 {
206 if (IsCreature((target)) && !target->ToCreature()->IsPet()) // Prevented sending text to pets.
207 {
208 if (e.action.talk.useTalkTarget)
209 {
210 talker = me;
211 talkTarget = target->ToCreature();
212 }
213 else
214 talker = target->ToCreature();
215 break;
216 }
217 else if (IsPlayer((target)))
218 {
219 talker = me; // xinef: added
220 talkTarget = target->ToPlayer();
221 break;
222 }
223 }
224
225 if (!talkTarget)
226 talkTarget = GetLastInvoker();
227
228 if (!talker)
229 break;
230
231 if (!sCreatureTextMgr->TextExist(talker->GetEntry(), uint8(e.action.talk.textGroupID)))
232 {
233 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_TALK: EntryOrGuid {} SourceType {} EventType {} TargetType {} using non-existent Text id {} for talker {}, ignored.", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.GetEventType(), e.GetTargetType(), e.action.talk.textGroupID, talker->GetEntry());
234 break;
235 }
236
237 mTalkerEntry = talker->GetEntry();
238 mLastTextID = e.action.talk.textGroupID;
239 mTextTimer = e.action.talk.duration;
240 mUseTextTimer = true;
241 sCreatureTextMgr->SendChat(talker, uint8(e.action.talk.textGroupID), talkTarget);
242 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_TALK: talker: {} ({}), textId: {}", talker->GetName(), talker->GetGUID().ToString(), mLastTextID);
243 break;
244 }
245 case SMART_ACTION_SIMPLE_TALK:
246 {
247 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
248 {
249 if (IsCreature(target))
250 sCreatureTextMgr->SendChat(target->ToCreature(), uint8(e.action.simpleTalk.textGroupID), IsPlayer(GetLastInvoker()) ? GetLastInvoker() : 0);
251 else if (IsPlayer(target) && me)
252 {
253 WorldObject* templastInvoker = GetLastInvoker();
254 sCreatureTextMgr->SendChat(me, uint8(e.action.simpleTalk.textGroupID), IsPlayer(templastInvoker) ? templastInvoker : 0, CHAT_MSG_ADDON, LANG_ADDON, TEXT_RANGE_NORMAL, 0, TEAM_NEUTRAL, false, target->ToPlayer());
255 }
256
257 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SIMPLE_TALK: talker: {} ({}), textGroupId: {}",
258 target->GetName(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), uint8(e.action.simpleTalk.textGroupID));
259 }
260 break;
261 }
262 case SMART_ACTION_PLAY_EMOTE:
263 {
264 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
265 {
266 if (IsUnit(target))
267 {
268 target->ToUnit()->HandleEmoteCommand(e.action.emote.emote);
269 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_PLAY_EMOTE: target: {} ({}), emote: {}",
270 target->GetName(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.emote.emote);
271 }
272 }
273 break;
274 }
275 case SMART_ACTION_SOUND:
276 {
277 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
278 {
279 if (IsUnit(target))
280 {
281 if (e.action.sound.distance == 1)
282 target->PlayDistanceSound(e.action.sound.sound, e.action.sound.onlySelf ? target->ToPlayer() : nullptr);
283 else
284 target->PlayDirectSound(e.action.sound.sound, e.action.sound.onlySelf ? target->ToPlayer() : nullptr);
285 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SOUND: target: {} ({}), sound: {}, onlyself: {}",
286 target->GetName(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.sound.sound, e.action.sound.onlySelf);
287 }
288 }
289 break;
290 }
291 case SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_SOUND:
292 {
293 uint32 sounds[4];
294 sounds[0] = e.action.randomSound.sound1;
295 sounds[1] = e.action.randomSound.sound2;
296 sounds[2] = e.action.randomSound.sound3;
297 sounds[3] = e.action.randomSound.sound4;
298 uint32 temp[4];
299 uint32 count = 0;
300 for (unsigned int sound : sounds)
301 {
302 if (sound)
303 {
304 temp[count] = sound;
305 ++count;
306 }
307 }
308
309 if (count == 0)
310 {
311 break;
312 }
313
314 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
315 {
316 if (IsUnit(target))
317 {
318 uint32 sound = temp[urand(0, count - 1)];
319 target->PlayDirectSound(sound, e.action.randomSound.onlySelf ? target->ToPlayer() : nullptr);
320 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_SOUND: target: {} ({}), sound: {}, onlyself: {}",
321 target->GetName(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), sound, e.action.randomSound.onlySelf);
322 }
323 }
324
325 break;
326 }
327 case SMART_ACTION_MUSIC:
328 {
329 ObjectVector targets;
330
331 if (e.action.music.type > 0)
332 {
333 if (me && me->FindMap())
334 {
335 Map::PlayerList const& players = me->GetMap()->GetPlayers();
336
337 if (!players.IsEmpty())
338 {
339 for (Map::PlayerList::const_iterator i = players.begin(); i != players.end(); ++i)
340 if (Player* player = i->GetSource())
341 {
342 if (player->GetZoneId() == me->GetZoneId())
343 {
344 if (e.action.music.type > 1)
345 {
346 if (player->GetAreaId() == me->GetAreaId())
347 targets.push_back(player);
348 }
349 else
350 targets.push_back(player);
351 }
352 }
353 }
354 }
355 }
356 else
357 GetTargets(targets, e);
358
359 if (!targets.empty())
360 {
361 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
362 {
363 if (IsUnit(target))
364 {
365 target->SendPlayMusic(e.action.music.sound, e.action.music.onlySelf > 0);
366 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_MUSIC: target: {} ({}), sound: {}, onlySelf: {}, type: {}",
367 target->GetName(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.music.sound, e.action.music.onlySelf, e.action.music.type);
368 }
369 }
370 }
371 break;
372 }
373 case SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_MUSIC:
374 {
375 ObjectVector targets;
376
377 if (e.action.randomMusic.type > 0)
378 {
379 if (me && me->FindMap())
380 {
381 Map::PlayerList const& players = me->GetMap()->GetPlayers();
382
383 if (!players.IsEmpty())
384 {
385 for (Map::PlayerList::const_iterator i = players.begin(); i != players.end(); ++i)
386 if (Player* player = i->GetSource())
387 {
388 if (player->GetZoneId() == me->GetZoneId())
389 {
390 if (e.action.randomMusic.type > 1)
391 {
392 if (player->GetAreaId() == me->GetAreaId())
393 targets.push_back(player);
394 }
395 else
396 targets.push_back(player);
397 }
398 }
399 }
400 }
401 }
402 else
403 GetTargets(targets, e);
404
405 if (targets.empty())
406 break;
407
408 uint32 sounds[4];
409 sounds[0] = e.action.randomMusic.sound1;
410 sounds[1] = e.action.randomMusic.sound2;
411 sounds[2] = e.action.randomMusic.sound3;
412 sounds[3] = e.action.randomMusic.sound4;
413 uint32 temp[4];
414 uint32 count = 0;
415 for (unsigned int sound : sounds)
416 {
417 if (sound)
418 {
419 temp[count] = sound;
420 ++count;
421 }
422 }
423
424 if (count == 0)
425 {
426 break;
427 }
428
429 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
430 {
431 if (IsUnit(target))
432 {
433 uint32 sound = temp[urand(0, count - 1)];
434 target->SendPlayMusic(sound, e.action.randomMusic.onlySelf > 0);
435 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_MUSIC: target: {} ({}), sound: {}, onlyself: {}, type: {}",
436 target->GetName(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), sound, e.action.randomMusic.onlySelf, e.action.randomMusic.type);
437 }
438 }
439
440 break;
441 }
442 case SMART_ACTION_SET_FACTION:
443 {
444 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
445 {
446 if (IsCreature(target))
447 {
448 if (e.action.faction.factionID)
449 {
450 target->ToCreature()->SetFaction(e.action.faction.factionID);
451 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SET_FACTION: Creature entry {}, GuidLow {} set faction to {}",
452 target->GetEntry(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.faction.factionID);
453 }
454 else
455 {
456 if (CreatureTemplate const* ci = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(target->ToCreature()->GetEntry()))
457 {
458 if (target->ToCreature()->GetFaction() != ci->faction)
459 {
460 target->ToCreature()->SetFaction(ci->faction);
461 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SET_FACTION: Creature entry {}, GuidLow {} set faction to {}",
462 target->GetEntry(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), ci->faction);
463 }
464 }
465 }
466 }
467 }
468 break;
469 }
470 case SMART_ACTION_MORPH_TO_ENTRY_OR_MODEL:
471 {
472 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
473 {
474 if (!IsCreature(target))
475 continue;
476
477 if (e.action.morphOrMount.creature || e.action.morphOrMount.model)
478 {
479 //set model based on entry from creature_template
480 if (e.action.morphOrMount.creature)
481 {
482 if (CreatureTemplate const* ci = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(e.action.morphOrMount.creature))
483 {
484 CreatureModel const* model = ObjectMgr::ChooseDisplayId(ci);
485 target->ToCreature()->SetDisplayId(model->CreatureDisplayID, model->DisplayScale);
486 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_MORPH_TO_ENTRY_OR_MODEL: Creature entry {}, GuidLow {} set displayid to {}",
487 target->GetEntry(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), model->CreatureDisplayID);
488 }
489 }
490 //if no param1, then use value from param2 (modelId)
491 else
492 {
493 target->ToCreature()->SetDisplayId(e.action.morphOrMount.model);
494 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_MORPH_TO_ENTRY_OR_MODEL: Creature entry {}, GuidLow {} set displayid to {}",
495 target->GetEntry(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.morphOrMount.model);
496 }
497 }
498 else
499 {
500 target->ToCreature()->DeMorph();
501 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_MORPH_TO_ENTRY_OR_MODEL: Creature entry {}, GuidLow {} demorphs.",
502 target->GetEntry(), target->GetGUID().ToString());
503 }
504 }
505 break;
506 }
507 case SMART_ACTION_FAIL_QUEST:
508 {
509 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
510 {
511 if (IsPlayer(target))
512 {
513 target->ToPlayer()->FailQuest(e.action.quest.quest);
514 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_FAIL_QUEST: Player guidLow {} fails quest {}",
515 target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.quest.quest);
516 }
517 }
518 break;
519 }
520 case SMART_ACTION_OFFER_QUEST:
521 {
522 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
523 {
524 if (Player* player = target->ToPlayer())
525 {
526 if (Quest const* q = sObjectMgr->GetQuestTemplate(e.action.questOffer.questID))
527 {
528 if (me && e.action.questOffer.directAdd == 0)
529 {
530 if (player->CanTakeQuest(q, true))
531 {
532 if (WorldSession* session = player->GetSession())
533 {
534 PlayerMenu menu(session);
535 menu.SendQuestGiverQuestDetails(q, me->GetGUID(), true);
536 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_OFFER_QUEST: Player guidLow {} - offering quest {}",
537 player->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.questOffer.questID);
538 }
539 }
540 }
541 else
542 {
543 player->AddQuestAndCheckCompletion(q, nullptr);
544 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_OFFER_QUEST: Player guidLow {} - quest {} added",
545 player->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.questOffer.questID);
546 }
547 }
548 }
549 }
550 break;
551 }
552 case SMART_ACTION_SET_REACT_STATE:
553 {
554 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
555 {
556 if (!IsCreature(target))
557 continue;
558
559 target->ToCreature()->SetReactState(ReactStates(e.action.react.state));
560 }
561 break;
562 }
563 case SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_EMOTE:
564 {
565 std::vector<uint32> emotes;
566 std::copy_if(e.action.randomEmote.emotes.begin(), e.action.randomEmote.emotes.end(),
567 std::back_inserter(emotes), [](uint32 emote) { return emote != 0; });
568
569 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
570 {
571 if (IsUnit(target))
572 {
573 uint32 emote = Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(emotes);
574 target->ToUnit()->HandleEmoteCommand(emote);
575 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_EMOTE: Creature guidLow {} handle random emote {}",
576 target->GetGUID().ToString(), emote);
577 }
578 }
579 break;
580 }
581 case SMART_ACTION_THREAT_ALL_PCT:
582 {
583 if (!me)
584 break;
585
586 ThreatContainer::StorageType threatList = me->GetThreatMgr().GetThreatList();
587 for (ThreatContainer::StorageType::const_iterator i = threatList.begin(); i != threatList.end(); ++i)
588 {
589 if (Unit* target = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*me, (*i)->getUnitGuid()))
590 {
591 me->GetThreatMgr().ModifyThreatByPercent(target, e.action.threatPCT.threatINC ? (int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatINC : -(int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatDEC);
592 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_THREAT_ALL_PCT: Creature {} modify threat for unit {}, value {}",
593 me->GetGUID().ToString(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.threatPCT.threatINC ? (int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatINC : -(int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatDEC);
594 }
595 }
596 break;
597 }
598 case SMART_ACTION_THREAT_SINGLE_PCT:
599 {
600 if (!me)
601 break;
602
603 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
604 {
605 if (IsUnit(target))
606 {
607 me->GetThreatMgr().ModifyThreatByPercent(target->ToUnit(), e.action.threatPCT.threatINC ? (int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatINC : -(int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatDEC);
608 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_THREAT_SINGLE_PCT: Creature guidLow {} modify threat for unit {}, value {}",
609 me->GetGUID().ToString(), target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.threatPCT.threatINC ? (int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatINC : -(int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatDEC);
610 }
611 }
612 break;
613 }
614 case SMART_ACTION_CALL_AREAEXPLOREDOREVENTHAPPENS:
615 {
616 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
617 {
618 // Special handling for vehicles
619 if (IsUnit(target))
620 if (Vehicle* vehicle = target->ToUnit()->GetVehicleKit())
621 for (auto & Seat : vehicle->Seats)
622 if (Player* player = ObjectAccessor::GetPlayer(*target, Seat.second.Passenger.Guid))
623 player->AreaExploredOrEventHappens(e.action.quest.quest);
624
625 if (IsPlayer(target))
626 {
627 target->ToPlayer()->AreaExploredOrEventHappens(e.action.quest.quest);
628
629 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_CALL_AREAEXPLOREDOREVENTHAPPENS: Player guidLow {} credited quest {}",
630 target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.quest.quest);
631 }
632 }
633 break;
634 }
635 case SMART_ACTION_CAST:
636 {
637 if (targets.empty())
638 break;
639
640 Unit* caster = me;
641 // Areatrigger Cast!
642 if (e.GetScriptType() == SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_AREATRIGGER)
643 caster = unit->SummonTrigger(unit->GetPositionX(), unit->GetPositionY(), unit->GetPositionZ(), unit->GetOrientation(), 5000);
644
645 if (e.action.cast.targetsLimit)
646 Acore::Containers::RandomResize(targets, e.action.cast.targetsLimit);
647
648 bool failedSpellCast = false, successfulSpellCast = false;
649
650 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
651 {
652 // may be nullptr
653 if (go)
654 go->CastSpell(target->ToUnit(), e.action.cast.spell);
655
656 if (!IsUnit(target))
657 continue;
658
659 if (caster && caster != me) // Areatrigger cast
660 {
661 caster->CastSpell(target->ToUnit(), e.action.cast.spell, (e.action.cast.castFlags & SMARTCAST_TRIGGERED));
662 }
663 else if (me)
664 {
665 // If target has the aura, skip
666 if ((e.action.cast.castFlags & SMARTCAST_AURA_NOT_PRESENT) && target->ToUnit()->HasAura(e.action.cast.spell))
667 continue;
668
669 // If the threatlist is a singleton, cancel
670 if (e.action.cast.castFlags & SMARTCAST_THREATLIST_NOT_SINGLE)
671 if (me->GetThreatMgr().GetThreatListSize() <= 1)
672 break;
673
674 // If target does not use mana, skip
675 if ((e.action.cast.castFlags & SMARTCAST_TARGET_POWER_MANA) && !target->ToUnit()->GetPower(POWER_MANA))
676 continue;
677
678 // Interrupts current spellcast
679 if (e.action.cast.castFlags & SMARTCAST_INTERRUPT_PREVIOUS)
680 me->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
681
682 SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(e.action.cast.spell);
683 float distanceToTarget = me->GetDistance(target->ToUnit());
684 float spellMaxRange = me->GetSpellMaxRangeForTarget(target->ToUnit(), spellInfo);
685 float spellMinRange = me->GetSpellMinRangeForTarget(target->ToUnit(), spellInfo);
686 float meleeRange = me->GetMeleeRange(target->ToUnit());
687
688 bool isWithinLOSInMap = me->IsWithinLOSInMap(target->ToUnit());
689 bool isWithinMeleeRange = distanceToTarget <= meleeRange;
690 bool isRangedAttack = spellMaxRange > NOMINAL_MELEE_RANGE;
691 bool isTargetRooted = target->ToUnit()->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ROOT);
692 // To prevent running back and forth when OOM, we must have more than 10% mana.
693 bool canCastSpell = me->GetPowerPct(POWER_MANA) > 10.0f && spellInfo->CalcPowerCost(me, spellInfo->GetSchoolMask()) < (int32)me->GetPower(POWER_MANA) && !me->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED);
694 bool isSpellIgnoreLOS = spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR2_IGNORE_LINE_OF_SIGHT);
695
696 // If target is rooted we move out of melee range before casting, but not further than spell max range.
697 if (isWithinLOSInMap && isWithinMeleeRange && isRangedAttack && isTargetRooted && canCastSpell && !me->IsVehicle())
698 {
699 failedSpellCast = true; // Mark spellcast as failed so we can retry it later
700
701 if (me->IsRooted()) // Rooted inhabit type, never move/reposition
702 continue;
703
704 float minDistance = std::max(meleeRange, spellMinRange) - distanceToTarget + NOMINAL_MELEE_RANGE;
705 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->MoveAway(std::min(minDistance, spellMaxRange));
706 continue;
707 }
708
709 // Let us not try to cast spell if we know it is going to fail anyway. Stick to chasing and continue.
710 if (distanceToTarget > spellMaxRange && isWithinLOSInMap)
711 {
712 failedSpellCast = true;
713
714 if (me->IsRooted()) // Rooted inhabit type, never move/reposition
715 continue;
716
717 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetCombatMove(true, std::max(spellMaxRange - NOMINAL_MELEE_RANGE, 0.0f));
718 continue;
719 }
720 else if (distanceToTarget < spellMinRange || !(isWithinLOSInMap || isSpellIgnoreLOS))
721 {
722 failedSpellCast = true;
723
724 if (me->IsRooted()) // Rooted inhabit type, never move/reposition
725 continue;
726
727 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetCombatMove(true);
728 continue;
729 }
730
731 TriggerCastFlags triggerFlags = TRIGGERED_NONE;
732 if (e.action.cast.castFlags & SMARTCAST_TRIGGERED)
733 {
734 if (e.action.cast.triggerFlags)
735 triggerFlags = TriggerCastFlags(e.action.cast.triggerFlags);
736 else
737 triggerFlags = TRIGGERED_FULL_MASK;
738 }
739
740 SpellCastResult result = me->CastSpell(target->ToUnit(), e.action.cast.spell, triggerFlags);
741 bool spellCastFailed = (result != SPELL_CAST_OK && result != SPELL_FAILED_SPELL_IN_PROGRESS);
742
743 if (e.action.cast.castFlags & SMARTCAST_COMBAT_MOVE)
744 {
745 // If cast flag SMARTCAST_COMBAT_MOVE is set combat movement will not be allowed unless target is outside spell range, out of mana, or LOS.
746 if (result == SPELL_FAILED_OUT_OF_RANGE)
747 // if we are just out of range, we only chase until we are back in spell range.
748 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetCombatMove(true, std::max(spellMaxRange - NOMINAL_MELEE_RANGE, 0.0f));
749 else
750 // if spell fail for any other reason, we chase to melee range, or stay where we are if spellcast was successful.
751 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetCombatMove(spellCastFailed);
752 }
753
754 if (spellCastFailed)
755 failedSpellCast = true;
756 else
757 successfulSpellCast = true;
758
759 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_CAST: Unit {} casts spell {} on target {} with castflags {}",
760 me->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.cast.spell, target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.cast.castFlags);
761 }
762 }
763
764 // If there is at least 1 failed cast and no successful casts at all, retry again on next loop
765 if (failedSpellCast && !successfulSpellCast)
766 {
767 RetryLater(e, true);
768 // Don't execute linked events
769 return;
770 }
771
772 break;
773 }
774 case SMART_ACTION_SELF_CAST:
775 {
776 if (targets.empty())
777 break;
778
779 if (e.action.cast.targetsLimit)
780 Acore::Containers::RandomResize(targets, e.action.cast.targetsLimit);
781
782 TriggerCastFlags triggerFlags = TRIGGERED_NONE;
783 if (e.action.cast.castFlags & SMARTCAST_TRIGGERED)
784 {
785 if (e.action.cast.triggerFlags)
786 {
787 triggerFlags = TriggerCastFlags(e.action.cast.triggerFlags);
788 }
789 else
790 {
791 triggerFlags = TRIGGERED_FULL_MASK;
792 }
793 }
794
795 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
796 {
797 Unit* uTarget = target->ToUnit();
798 if (!uTarget)
799 continue;
800
801 if (!(e.action.cast.castFlags & SMARTCAST_AURA_NOT_PRESENT) || !uTarget->HasAura(e.action.cast.spell))
802 {
803 if (e.action.cast.castFlags & SMARTCAST_INTERRUPT_PREVIOUS)
804 {
805 uTarget->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
806 }
807
808 uTarget->CastSpell(uTarget, e.action.cast.spell, triggerFlags);
809 }
810 }
811 break;
812 }
813 case SMART_ACTION_INVOKER_CAST:
814 {
815 // Can be used for area trigger cast
816 WorldObject* tempLastInvoker = GetLastInvoker(unit);
817 if (!tempLastInvoker)
818 break;
819
820 if (targets.empty())
821 break;
822
823 if (e.action.cast.targetsLimit)
824 Acore::Containers::RandomResize(targets, e.action.cast.targetsLimit);
825
826 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
827 {
828 if (!IsUnit(target))
829 continue;
830
831 if (!IsUnit(tempLastInvoker))
832 continue;
833
834 if (!(e.action.cast.castFlags & SMARTCAST_AURA_NOT_PRESENT) || !target->ToUnit()->HasAura(e.action.cast.spell))
835 {
836 if (e.action.cast.castFlags & SMARTCAST_INTERRUPT_PREVIOUS)
837 {
838 tempLastInvoker->ToUnit()->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
839 }
840
841 TriggerCastFlags triggerFlags = TRIGGERED_NONE;
842 if (e.action.cast.castFlags & SMARTCAST_TRIGGERED)
843 {
844 if (e.action.cast.triggerFlags)
845 {
846 triggerFlags = TriggerCastFlags(e.action.cast.triggerFlags);
847 }
848 else
849 {
850 triggerFlags = TRIGGERED_FULL_MASK;
851 }
852 }
853
854 tempLastInvoker->ToUnit()->CastSpell(target->ToUnit(), e.action.cast.spell, triggerFlags);
855 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_INVOKER_CAST: Invoker {} casts spell {} on target {} with castflags {}",
856 tempLastInvoker->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.cast.spell, target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.cast.castFlags);
857 }
858 else
859 {
860 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "Spell {} not cast because it has flag SMARTCAST_AURA_NOT_PRESENT and the target {} already has the aura",
861 e.action.cast.spell, target->GetGUID().ToString());
862 }
863 }
864 break;
865 }
866 case SMART_ACTION_ADD_AURA:
867 {
868 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
869 {
870 if (IsUnit(target))
871 {
872 target->ToUnit()->AddAura(e.action.cast.spell, target->ToUnit());
873 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_ADD_AURA: Adding aura {} to unit {}",
874 e.action.cast.spell, target->GetGUID().ToString());
875 }
876 }
877 break;
878 }
879 case SMART_ACTION_ACTIVATE_GOBJECT:
880 {
881 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
882 {
883 if (IsGameObject(target))
884 {
885 GameObject* go = target->ToGameObject();
886
887 // Activate
888 if (go->GetGoType() != GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_DOOR)
889 {
890 go->SetLootState(GO_READY);
891 }
892
893 go->UseDoorOrButton(0, !!e.action.activateObject.alternative, unit);
894 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_ACTIVATE_GOBJECT. Gameobject {} activated", go->GetGUID().ToString());
895 }
896 }
897
898 break;
899 }
900 case SMART_ACTION_RESET_GOBJECT:
901 {
902 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
903 {
904 if (IsGameObject(target))
905 {
906 target->ToGameObject()->ResetDoorOrButton();
907 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_RESET_GOBJECT. Gameobject {} (entry: {}) reset",
908 target->GetGUID().ToString(), target->GetEntry());
909 }
910 }
911 break;
912 }
913 case SMART_ACTION_SET_EMOTE_STATE:
914 {
915 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
916 {
917 if (IsUnit(target))
918 {
919 target->ToUnit()->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_NPC_EMOTESTATE, e.action.emote.emote);
920 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SET_EMOTE_STATE. Unit {} set emotestate to {}",
921 target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.emote.emote);
922 }
923 }
924 break;
925 }
926 case SMART_ACTION_SET_UNIT_FLAG:
927 {
928 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
929 {
930 if (IsUnit(target))
931 {
932 if (!e.action.unitFlag.type)
933 {
934 target->ToUnit()->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
935 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SET_UNIT_FLAG. Unit {} added flag {} to UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS",
936 target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.unitFlag.flag);
937 }
938 else
939 {
940 target->ToUnit()->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
941 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SET_UNIT_FLAG. Unit {} added flag {} to UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2",
942 target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.unitFlag.flag);
943 }
944 }
945 }
946 break;
947 }
948 case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_UNIT_FLAG:
949 {
950 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
951 {
952 if (IsUnit(target))
953 {
954 if (!e.action.unitFlag.type)
955 {
956 target->ToUnit()->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
957 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_UNIT_FLAG. Unit {} removed flag {} to UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS",
958 target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.unitFlag.flag);
959 }
960 else
961 {
962 target->ToUnit()->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
963 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_UNIT_FLAG. Unit {} removed flag {} to UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2",
964 target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.unitFlag.flag);
965 }
966 }
967 }
968 break;
969 }
970 case SMART_ACTION_AUTO_ATTACK:
971 {
972 if (!IsSmart())
973 break;
974
975 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetAutoAttack(e.action.autoAttack.attack);
976 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_AUTO_ATTACK: Creature: {} bool on = {}",
977 me->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.autoAttack.attack);
978 break;
979 }
980 case SMART_ACTION_ALLOW_COMBAT_MOVEMENT:
981 {
982 if (!IsSmart())
983 break;
984
985 bool move = e.action.combatMove.move;
986 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetCombatMove(move);
987 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_ALLOW_COMBAT_MOVEMENT: Creature {} bool on = {}",
988 me->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.combatMove.move);
989 break;
990 }
991 case SMART_ACTION_SET_EVENT_PHASE:
992 {
993 if (!GetBaseObject())
994 break;
995
996 SetPhase(e.action.setEventPhase.phase);
997 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SET_EVENT_PHASE: Creature {} set event phase {}",
998 GetBaseObject()->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.setEventPhase.phase);
999 break;
1000 }
1001 case SMART_ACTION_INC_EVENT_PHASE:
1002 {
1003 if (!GetBaseObject())
1004 break;
1005
1006 IncPhase(e.action.incEventPhase.inc);
1007 DecPhase(e.action.incEventPhase.dec);
1008 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_INC_EVENT_PHASE: Creature {} inc event phase by {}, "
1009 "decrease by {}", GetBaseObject()->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.incEventPhase.inc, e.action.incEventPhase.dec);
1010 break;
1011 }
1012 case SMART_ACTION_EVADE:
1013 {
1014 if (!GetBaseObject())
1015 break;
1016
1017 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1018 if (IsCreature(target))
1019 if (target->ToCreature()->IsAIEnabled)
1020 target->ToCreature()->AI()->EnterEvadeMode();
1021
1022 break;
1023 }
1024 case SMART_ACTION_FLEE_FOR_ASSIST:
1025 {
1026 // Xinef: do not allow to flee without control (stun, fear etc)
1027 if (!me || me->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_LOST_CONTROL) || me->GetSpeed(MOVE_RUN) < 0.1f)
1028 break;
1029
1030 me->DoFleeToGetAssistance();
1031 if (e.action.flee.withEmote)
1032 {
1033 Acore::BroadcastTextBuilder builder(me, CHAT_MSG_MONSTER_EMOTE, BROADCAST_TEXT_FLEE_FOR_ASSIST, me->getGender());
1034 sCreatureTextMgr->SendChatPacket(me, builder, CHAT_MSG_MONSTER_EMOTE);
1035 }
1036 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_FLEE_FOR_ASSIST: Creature {} DoFleeToGetAssistance", me->GetGUID().ToString());
1037 break;
1038 }
1039 case SMART_ACTION_COMBAT_STOP:
1040 {
1041 if (!me)
1042 break;
1043
1044 me->CombatStop(true);
1045 break;
1046 }
1047 case SMART_ACTION_CALL_GROUPEVENTHAPPENS:
1048 {
1049 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1050 {
1051 if (!IsUnit(target))
1052 continue;
1053
1054 Unit* unitTarget = target->ToUnit();
1055 // If invoker was pet or charm
1056 Player* player = unitTarget->GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself();
1057 if (player && GetBaseObject())
1058 {
1059 player->GroupEventHappens(e.action.quest.quest, GetBaseObject());
1060 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_CALL_GROUPEVENTHAPPENS: Player {}, group credit for quest {}",
1061 player->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.quest.quest);
1062 }
1063
1064 // Special handling for vehicles
1065 if (Vehicle* vehicle = unitTarget->GetVehicleKit())
1066 {
1067 for (auto& Seat : vehicle->Seats)
1068 {
1069 if (Player* player = ObjectAccessor::GetPlayer(*unitTarget, Seat.second.Passenger.Guid))
1070 {
1071 player->GroupEventHappens(e.action.quest.quest, GetBaseObject());
1072 }
1073 }
1074 }
1075 }
1076 break;
1077 }
1078 case SMART_ACTION_REMOVEAURASFROMSPELL:
1079 {
1080 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1081 {
1082 if (!IsUnit(target))
1083 continue;
1084
1085 if (e.action.removeAura.spell)
1086 {
1087 if (e.action.removeAura.charges)
1088 {
1089 if (Aura* aur = target->ToUnit()->GetAura(e.action.removeAura.spell))
1090 aur->ModCharges(-static_cast<int32>(e.action.removeAura.charges), AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE);
1091 }
1092 else
1093 target->ToUnit()->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(e.action.removeAura.spell);
1094 }
1095 else
1096 target->ToUnit()->RemoveAllAuras();
1097
1098 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_REMOVEAURASFROMSPELL: Unit {}, spell {}",
1099 target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.removeAura.spell);
1100 }
1101 break;
1102 }
1103 case SMART_ACTION_FOLLOW:
1104 {
1105 if (!IsSmart())
1106 break;
1107
1108 if (e.target.type == SMART_TARGET_NONE || e.target.type == SMART_TARGET_SELF)
1109 {
1110 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->StopFollow(false);
1111 break;
1112 }
1113
1114 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1115 {
1116 if (IsUnit(target))
1117 {
1118 float angle = e.action.follow.angle > 6 ? (e.action.follow.angle * M_PI / 180.0f) : e.action.follow.angle;
1119 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetFollow(target->ToUnit(), float(e.action.follow.dist) + 0.1f, angle, e.action.follow.credit, e.action.follow.entry, e.action.follow.creditType, e.action.follow.aliveState);
1120 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_FOLLOW: Creature {} following target {}",
1121 me->GetGUID().ToString(), target->GetGUID().ToString());
1122 break;
1123 }
1124 }
1125 break;
1126 }
1127 case SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_PHASE:
1128 {
1129 if (!GetBaseObject())
1130 break;
1131
1132 std::vector<uint32> phases;
1133 std::copy_if(e.action.randomPhase.phases.begin(), e.action.randomPhase.phases.end(),
1134 std::back_inserter(phases), [](uint32 phase) { return phase != 0; });
1135
1136 uint32 phase = Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(phases);
1137 SetPhase(phase);
1138 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_PHASE: Creature {} sets event phase to {}",
1139 GetBaseObject()->GetGUID().ToString(), phase);
1140 break;
1141 }
1142 case SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_PHASE_RANGE:
1143 {
1144 if (!GetBaseObject())
1145 break;
1146
1147 uint32 phase = urand(e.action.randomPhaseRange.phaseMin, e.action.randomPhaseRange.phaseMax);
1148 SetPhase(phase);
1149 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_PHASE_RANGE: Creature {} sets event phase to {}",
1150 GetBaseObject()->GetGUID().ToString(), phase);
1151 break;
1152 }
1153 case SMART_ACTION_CALL_KILLEDMONSTER:
1154 {
1155 if (trigger && IsPlayer(unit))
1156 {
1157 unit->ToPlayer()->RewardPlayerAndGroupAtEvent(e.action.killedMonster.creature, unit);
1158 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_CALL_KILLEDMONSTER: (trigger == true) Player {}, Killcredit: {}",
1159 unit->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.killedMonster.creature);
1160 }
1161 else if (e.target.type == SMART_TARGET_NONE || e.target.type == SMART_TARGET_SELF) // Loot recipient and his group members
1162 {
1163 if (!me)
1164 break;
1165
1166 if (Player* player = me->GetLootRecipient())
1167 {
1168 player->RewardPlayerAndGroupAtEvent(e.action.killedMonster.creature, player);
1169 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_CALL_KILLEDMONSTER: Player {}, Killcredit: {}",
1170 player->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.killedMonster.creature);
1171 }
1172 }
1173 else // Specific target type
1174 {
1175 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1176 {
1177 if (!IsUnit(target))
1178 continue;
1179
1180 Player* player = target->ToUnit()->GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself();
1181 if (!player)
1182 continue;
1183
1184 player->RewardPlayerAndGroupAtEvent(e.action.killedMonster.creature, player);
1185 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_CALL_KILLEDMONSTER: Player {}, Killcredit: {}",
1186 target->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.killedMonster.creature);
1187 }
1188 }
1189 break;
1190 }
1191 case SMART_ACTION_SET_INST_DATA:
1192 {
1193 WorldObject* obj = GetBaseObject();
1194 if (!obj)
1195 obj = unit;
1196
1197 if (!obj)
1198 break;
1199
1200 InstanceScript* instance = obj->GetInstanceScript();
1201 if (!instance)
1202 {
1203 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript: Event {} attempt to set instance data without instance script. EntryOrGuid {}", e.GetEventType(), e.entryOrGuid);
1204 break;
1205 }
1206
1207 switch (e.action.setInstanceData.type)
1208 {
1209 case 0:
1210 {
1211 instance->SetData(e.action.setInstanceData.field, e.action.setInstanceData.data);
1212 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_SET_INST_DATA: Field: {}, data: {}", e.action.setInstanceData.field, e.action.setInstanceData.data);
1213 } break;
1214 case 1:
1215 {
1216 instance->SetBossState(e.action.setInstanceData.field, static_cast<EncounterState>(e.action.setInstanceData.data));
1217 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_SET_INST_DATA: SetBossState BossId: {}, State: {} ({})", e.action.setInstanceData.field, e.action.setInstanceData.data, InstanceScript::GetBossStateName(e.action.setInstanceData.data));
1218 } break;
1219 default:
1220 {
1221 break;
1222 }
1223 }
1224 break;
1225 }
1226 case SMART_ACTION_SET_INST_DATA64:
1227 {
1228 WorldObject* obj = GetBaseObject();
1229 if (!obj)
1230 obj = unit;
1231
1232 if (!obj)
1233 break;
1234
1235 InstanceScript* instance = obj->GetInstanceScript();
1236 if (!instance)
1237 {
1238 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Event {} attempt to set instance data without instance script. EntryOrGuid {}", e.GetEventType(), e.entryOrGuid);
1239 break;
1240 }
1241
1242 if (targets.empty())
1243 break;
1244
1245 instance->SetGuidData(e.action.setInstanceData64.field, targets.front()->GetGUID());
1246 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_SET_INST_DATA64: Field: {}, data: {}",
1247 e.action.setInstanceData64.field, targets.front()->GetGUID().ToString());
1248 break;
1249 }
1250 case SMART_ACTION_UPDATE_TEMPLATE:
1251 {
1252 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1253 if (IsCreature(target))
1254 target->ToCreature()->UpdateEntry(e.action.updateTemplate.creature, target->ToCreature()->GetCreatureData(), e.action.updateTemplate.updateLevel != 0);
1255 break;
1256 }
1257 case SMART_ACTION_DIE:
1258 {
1259 if (e.action.die.milliseconds)
1260 {
1261 if (me && !me->isDead())
1262 {
1263 me->m_Events.AddEventAtOffset([&]
1264 {
1265 // We need to check again to see if we didn't die in the process.
1266 if (me && !me->isDead())
1267 {
1268 me->KillSelf();
1269 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_DIE: Creature {}", me->GetGUID().ToString());
1270 }
1271 }, Milliseconds(e.action.die.milliseconds));
1272 }
1273 }
1274 else if (me && !me->isDead())
1275 {
1276 me->KillSelf();
1277 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_DIE: Creature {}", me->GetGUID().ToString());
1278 }
1279 break;
1280 }
1281 case SMART_ACTION_SET_IN_COMBAT_WITH_ZONE:
1282 {
1283 if (targets.empty())
1284 break;
1285
1286 if (!me->GetMap()->IsDungeon())
1287 {
1288 ObjectVector units;
1289 GetWorldObjectsInDist(units, static_cast<float>(e.target.unitRange.maxDist));
1290
1291 if (!units.empty() && GetBaseObject())
1292 for (WorldObject* unit : units)
1293 if (IsPlayer(unit) && !unit->ToPlayer()->isDead())
1294 {
1295 me->SetInCombatWith(unit->ToPlayer());
1296 unit->ToPlayer()->SetInCombatWith(me);
1297 me->AddThreat(unit->ToPlayer(), 0.0f);
1298 }
1299 }
1300 else
1301 {
1302 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1303 {
1304 if (IsCreature(target))
1305 {
1306 target->ToCreature()->SetInCombatWithZone();
1307 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_SET_IN_COMBAT_WITH_ZONE: Creature {}, target: {}",
1308 me->GetGUID().ToString(), target->GetGUID().ToString());
1309 }
1310 }
1311 }
1312
1313 break;
1314 }
1315 case SMART_ACTION_CALL_FOR_HELP:
1316 {
1317 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1318 {
1319 if (IsCreature(target))
1320 {
1321 target->ToCreature()->CallForHelp(float(e.action.callHelp.range));
1322 if (e.action.callHelp.withEmote)
1323 {
1324 Acore::BroadcastTextBuilder builder(target, CHAT_MSG_MONSTER_EMOTE, BROADCAST_TEXT_CALL_FOR_HELP, LANG_UNIVERSAL, nullptr);
1325 sCreatureTextMgr->SendChatPacket(target, builder, CHAT_MSG_MONSTER_EMOTE);
1326 }
1327 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_CALL_FOR_HELP: Creature {}, target: {}",
1328 me->GetGUID().ToString(), target->GetGUID().ToString());
1329 }
1330 }
1331 break;
1332 }
1333 case SMART_ACTION_SET_SHEATH:
1334 {
1335 if (me)
1336 {
1337 me->SetSheath(SheathState(e.action.setSheath.sheath));
1338 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_SET_SHEATH: Creature {}, State: {}",
1339 me->GetGUID().ToString(), e.action.setSheath.sheath);
1340 }
1341 break;
1342 }
1343 case SMART_ACTION_FORCE_DESPAWN:
1344 {
1345 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1346 {
1347 if (e.action.forceDespawn.removeObjectFromWorld)
1348 {
1349 if (e.action.forceDespawn.delay || e.action.forceDespawn.forceRespawnTimer)
1350 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: SMART_ACTION_FORCE_DESPAWN has removeObjectFromWorld set. delay and forceRespawnTimer ignored.");
1351
1352 if (Creature* creature = target->ToCreature())
1353 creature->AddObjectToRemoveList();
1354 else if (GameObject* go = target->ToGameObject())
1355 go->AddObjectToRemoveList();
1356 }
1357 else
1358 {
1359 Milliseconds despawnDelay(e.action.forceDespawn.delay);
1360
1361 // Wait at least one world update tick before despawn, so it doesn't break linked actions.
1362 if (despawnDelay <= 0ms)
1363 despawnDelay = 1ms;
1364
1365 Seconds forceRespawnTimer(e.action.forceDespawn.forceRespawnTimer);
1366 if (Creature* creature = target->ToCreature())
1367 creature->DespawnOrUnsummon(despawnDelay, forceRespawnTimer);
1368 else if (GameObject* go = target->ToGameObject())
1369 go->DespawnOrUnsummon(despawnDelay, forceRespawnTimer);
1370 }
1371 }
1372
1373 break;
1374 }
1375 case SMART_ACTION_SET_INGAME_PHASE_MASK:
1376 {
1377 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1378 {
1379 if (IsUnit(target))
1380 target->ToUnit()->SetPhaseMask(e.action.ingamePhaseMask.mask, true);
1381 else if (IsGameObject(target))
1382 target->ToGameObject()->SetPhaseMask(e.action.ingamePhaseMask.mask, true);
1383 }
1384 break;
1385 }
1386 case SMART_ACTION_MOUNT_TO_ENTRY_OR_MODEL:
1387 {
1388 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1389 {
1390 if (!IsUnit(target))
1391 continue;
1392
1393 if (e.action.morphOrMount.creature || e.action.morphOrMount.model)
1394 {
1395 if (e.action.morphOrMount.creature > 0)
1396 {
1397 if (CreatureTemplate const* cInfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(e.action.morphOrMount.creature))
1398 target->ToUnit()->Mount(ObjectMgr::ChooseDisplayId(cInfo)->CreatureDisplayID);
1399 }
1400 else
1401 target->ToUnit()->Mount(e.action.morphOrMount.model);
1402 }
1403 else
1404 target->ToUnit()->Dismount();
1405 }
1406 break;
1407 }
1408 case SMART_ACTION_SET_INVINCIBILITY_HP_LEVEL:
1409 {
1410 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1411 {
1412 if (IsCreature(target))
1413 {
1414 SmartAI* ai = CAST_AI(SmartAI, target->ToCreature()->AI());
1415 if (!ai)
1416 continue;
1417
1418 if (e.action.invincHP.percent)
1419 ai->SetInvincibilityHpLevel(target->ToCreature()->CountPctFromMaxHealth(e.action.invincHP.percent));
1420 else
1421 ai->SetInvincibilityHpLevel(e.action.invincHP.minHP);
1422 }
1423 }
1424 break;
1425 }
1426 case SMART_ACTION_SET_DATA:
1427 {
1428 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1429 {
1430 if (Creature* cTarget = target->ToCreature())
1431 {
1432 CreatureAI* ai = cTarget->AI();
1433 // Make sure we check that the sender is either a creature or gameobject
1434 if (IsSmart(cTarget, true) && (me || go))
1435 {
1436 if (me)
1437 ENSURE_AI(SmartAI, ai)->SetData(e.action.setData.field, e.action.setData.data, me);
1438 else
1439 ENSURE_AI(SmartAI, ai)->SetData(e.action.setData.field, e.action.setData.data, go);
1440 }
1441 else
1442 ai->SetData(e.action.setData.field, e.action.setData.data);
1443 }
1444 else if (GameObject* oTarget = target->ToGameObject())
1445 {
1446 GameObjectAI* ai = oTarget->AI();
1447 // Make sure we check that the sender is either a creature or gameobject
1448 if (IsSmart(oTarget, true) && (me || go))
1449 {
1450 if (me)
1451 ENSURE_AI(SmartGameObjectAI, ai)->SetData(e.action.setData.field, e.action.setData.data, me);
1452 else
1453 ENSURE_AI(SmartGameObjectAI, ai)->SetData(e.action.setData.field, e.action.setData.data, go);
1454 }
1455 else
1456 ai->SetData(e.action.setData.field, e.action.setData.data);
1457 }
1458 }
1459 break;
1460 }
1461 case SMART_ACTION_MOVE_FORWARD:
1462 {
1463 if (!me)
1464 break;
1465
1466 float x, y, z;
1467 me->GetClosePoint(x, y, z, me->GetObjectSize() / 3, (float)e.action.moveRandom.distance);
1468 me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(SMART_RANDOM_POINT, x, y, z);
1469 break;
1470 }
1471 case SMART_ACTION_RISE_UP:
1472 {
1473 if (!me)
1474 break;
1475
1476 me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(SMART_RANDOM_POINT, me->GetPositionX(), me->GetPositionY(), me->GetPositionZ() + (float)e.action.moveRandom.distance);
1477 break;
1478 }
1479 case SMART_ACTION_SET_VISIBILITY:
1480 {
1481 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1482 if (IsUnit(target))
1483 target->ToUnit()->SetVisible(!!e.action.visibility.state);
1484
1485 break;
1486 }
1487 case SMART_ACTION_SET_ACTIVE:
1488 {
1489 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1490 target->setActive(!!e.action.setActive.state);
1491 break;
1492 }
1493 case SMART_ACTION_ATTACK_START:
1494 {
1495 if (!me)
1496 break;
1497
1498 if (targets.empty())
1499 break;
1500
1501 // attack random target
1502 if (Unit* target = Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(targets)->ToUnit())
1503 me->AI()->AttackStart(target);
1504 break;
1505 }
1506 case SMART_ACTION_ATTACK_STOP:
1507 {
1508 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1509 if (Unit* unitTarget = target->ToUnit())
1510 unitTarget->AttackStop();
1511 break;
1512 }
1513 case SMART_ACTION_SUMMON_CREATURE:
1514 {
1515 EnumFlag<SmartActionSummonCreatureFlags> flags(static_cast<SmartActionSummonCreatureFlags>(e.action.summonCreature.flags));
1516 bool preferUnit = flags.HasFlag(SmartActionSummonCreatureFlags::PreferUnit);
1517 WorldObject* summoner = preferUnit ? unit : Coalesce<WorldObject>(GetBaseObject(), unit);
1518 if (!summoner)
1519 break;
1520
1521 bool personalSpawn = flags.HasFlag(SmartActionSummonCreatureFlags::PersonalSpawn);
1522
1523 if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_RANDOM_POINT)
1524 {
1525 float range = (float)e.target.randomPoint.range;
1526 Position randomPoint;
1527 Position srcPos = { e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o };
1528 for (uint32 i = 0; i < e.target.randomPoint.amount; i++)
1529 {
1530 if (e.target.randomPoint.self > 0)
1531 randomPoint = me->GetRandomPoint(me->GetPosition(), range);
1532 else
1533 randomPoint = me->GetRandomPoint(srcPos, range);
1534 if (Creature* summon = summoner->SummonCreature(e.action.summonCreature.creature, randomPoint, (TempSummonType)e.action.summonCreature.type, e.action.summonCreature.duration, 0, nullptr, personalSpawn))
1535 {
1536 if (unit && e.action.summonCreature.attackInvoker)
1537 summon->AI()->AttackStart(unit);
1538 else if (me && e.action.summonCreature.attackScriptOwner)
1539 summon->AI()->AttackStart(me);
1540 }
1541 }
1542 break;
1543 }
1544
1545 float x, y, z, o;
1546 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1547 {
1548 target->GetPosition(x, y, z, o);
1549 x += e.target.x;
1550 y += e.target.y;
1551 z += e.target.z;
1552 o += e.target.o;
