1553 if (Creature* summon = summoner->SummonCreature(e.action.summonCreature.creature, x, y, z, o, (TempSummonType)e.action.summonCreature.type, e.action.summonCreature.duration, nullptr, personalSpawn))
1554 {
1555 if (e.action.summonCreature.attackInvoker == 2) // pussywizard: proper attackInvoker implementation
1556 summon->AI()->AttackStart(unit);
1557 else if (e.action.summonCreature.attackInvoker)
1558 summon->AI()->AttackStart(target->ToUnit());
1559 else if (me && e.action.summonCreature.attackScriptOwner)
1560 summon->AI()->AttackStart(me);
1561 }
1562 }
1563
1564 if (e.GetTargetType() != SMART_TARGET_POSITION)
1565 break;
1566
1567 if (Creature* summon = summoner->SummonCreature(e.action.summonCreature.creature, e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o, (TempSummonType)e.action.summonCreature.type, e.action.summonCreature.duration))
1568 {
1569 if (unit && e.action.summonCreature.attackInvoker)
1570 summon->AI()->AttackStart(unit);
1571 else if (me && e.action.summonCreature.attackScriptOwner)
1572 summon->AI()->AttackStart(me);
1573 }
1574 break;
1575 }
1576 case SMART_ACTION_SUMMON_GO:
1577 {
1578 if (!GetBaseObject())
1579 break;
1580
1581 if (!targets.empty())
1582 {
1583 float x, y, z, o;
1584 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1585 {
1586 // xinef: allow gameobjects to summon gameobjects!
1587 //if (!IsUnit((*itr)))
1588 // continue;
1589
1590 target->GetPosition(x, y, z, o);
1591 x += e.target.x;
1592 y += e.target.y;
1593 z += e.target.z;
1594 o += e.target.o;
1595 if (!e.action.summonGO.targetsummon)
1596 GetBaseObject()->SummonGameObject(e.action.summonGO.entry, x, y, z, o, 0, 0, 0, 0, e.action.summonGO.despawnTime);
1597 else
1598 target->SummonGameObject(e.action.summonGO.entry, GetBaseObject()->GetPositionX(), GetBaseObject()->GetPositionY(), GetBaseObject()->GetPositionZ(), GetBaseObject()->GetOrientation(), 0, 0, 0, 0, e.action.summonGO.despawnTime);
1599 }
1600 }
1601
1602 if (e.GetTargetType() != SMART_TARGET_POSITION)
1603 break;
1604
1605 GetBaseObject()->SummonGameObject(e.action.summonGO.entry, e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o, 0, 0, 0, 0, e.action.summonGO.despawnTime);
1606 break;
1607 }
1608 case SMART_ACTION_KILL_UNIT:
1609 {
1610 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1611 {
1612 if (!IsUnit(target))
1613 continue;
1614
1615 Unit::Kill(target->ToUnit(), target->ToUnit());
1616 }
1617
1618 break;
1619 }
1620 case SMART_ACTION_INSTALL_AI_TEMPLATE:
1621 {
1622 InstallTemplate(e);
1623 break;
1624 }
1625 case SMART_ACTION_ADD_ITEM:
1626 {
1627 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1628 {
1629 if (!IsPlayer(target))
1630 continue;
1631
1632 target->ToPlayer()->AddItem(e.action.item.entry, e.action.item.count);
1633 }
1634 break;
1635 }
1636 case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_ITEM:
1637 {
1638 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1639 {
1640 if (!IsPlayer(target))
1641 continue;
1642
1643 target->ToPlayer()->DestroyItemCount(e.action.item.entry, e.action.item.count, true);
1644 }
1645 break;
1646 }
1647 case SMART_ACTION_STORE_TARGET_LIST:
1648 {
1649 StoreTargetList(targets, e.action.storeTargets.id);
1650 break;
1651 }
1652 case SMART_ACTION_TELEPORT:
1653 {
1654 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1655 {
1656 if (IsPlayer(target))
1657 target->ToPlayer()->TeleportTo(e.action.teleport.mapID, e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o);
1658 else if (IsCreature(target))
1659 target->ToCreature()->NearTeleportTo(e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o);
1660 }
1661 break;
1662 }
1663 case SMART_ACTION_SET_FLY:
1664 {
1665 if (!IsSmart())
1666 break;
1667
1668 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetFly(e.action.setFly.fly);
1669 // Xinef: Set speed if any
1670 if (e.action.setFly.speed)
1671 me->SetSpeed(MOVE_RUN, float(e.action.setFly.speed / 100.0f), true);
1672
1673 // Xinef: this wil be executed only if state is different
1674 me->SetDisableGravity(e.action.setFly.disableGravity);
1675 break;
1676 }
1677 case SMART_ACTION_SET_RUN:
1678 {
1679 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1680 {
1681 if (IsCreature(target))
1682 {
1683 if (IsSmart(target->ToCreature()))
1684 CAST_AI(SmartAI, target->ToCreature()->AI())->SetRun(e.action.setRun.run);
1685 else
1686 target->ToCreature()->SetWalk(e.action.setRun.run ? false : true); // Xinef: reversed
1687 }
1688 }
1689
1690 break;
1691 }
1692 case SMART_ACTION_SET_SWIM:
1693 {
1694 if (!IsSmart())
1695 break;
1696
1697 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetSwim(e.action.setSwim.swim);
1698 break;
1699 }
1700 case SMART_ACTION_SET_COUNTER:
1701 {
1702 if (!targets.empty())
1703 {
1704 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1705 {
1706 if (IsCreature(target))
1707 {
1708 if (SmartAI* ai = CAST_AI(SmartAI, target->ToCreature()->AI()))
1709 ai->GetScript()->StoreCounter(e.action.setCounter.counterId, e.action.setCounter.value, e.action.setCounter.reset, e.action.setCounter.subtract);
1710 else
1711 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Action target for SMART_ACTION_SET_COUNTER is not using SmartAI, skipping");
1712 }
1713 else if (IsGameObject(target))
1714 {
1715 if (SmartGameObjectAI* ai = CAST_AI(SmartGameObjectAI, target->ToGameObject()->AI()))
1716 ai->GetScript()->StoreCounter(e.action.setCounter.counterId, e.action.setCounter.value, e.action.setCounter.reset, e.action.setCounter.subtract);
1717 else
1718 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Action target for SMART_ACTION_SET_COUNTER is not using SmartGameObjectAI, skipping");
1719 }
1720 }
1721 }
1722 else
1723 StoreCounter(e.action.setCounter.counterId, e.action.setCounter.value, e.action.setCounter.reset, e.action.setCounter.subtract);
1724 break;
1725 }
1726 case SMART_ACTION_WP_START:
1727 {
1728 if (!IsSmart())
1729 break;
1730
1731 bool run = e.action.wpStart.run != 0;
1732 uint32 entry = e.action.wpStart.pathID;
1733 bool repeat = e.action.wpStart.repeat != 0;
1734
1735 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1736 {
1737 if (IsPlayer(target))
1738 {
1739 StoreTargetList(targets, SMART_ESCORT_TARGETS);
1740 break;
1741 }
1742 }
1743
1744 me->SetReactState((ReactStates)e.action.wpStart.reactState);
1745 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->StartPath(run, entry, repeat, unit);
1746
1747 uint32 quest = e.action.wpStart.quest;
1748 uint32 DespawnTime = e.action.wpStart.despawnTime;
1749 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->mEscortQuestID = quest;
1750 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetDespawnTime(DespawnTime);
1751 break;
1752 }
1753 case SMART_ACTION_WP_PAUSE:
1754 {
1755 if (!IsSmart())
1756 break;
1757
1758 uint32 delay = e.action.wpPause.delay;
1759 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->PausePath(delay, e.GetEventType() == SMART_EVENT_WAYPOINT_REACHED ? false : true);
1760 break;
1761 }
1762 case SMART_ACTION_WP_STOP:
1763 {
1764 if (!IsSmart())
1765 break;
1766
1767 uint32 DespawnTime = e.action.wpStop.despawnTime;
1768 uint32 quest = e.action.wpStop.quest;
1769 bool fail = e.action.wpStop.fail;
1770 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->StopPath(DespawnTime, quest, fail);
1771 break;
1772 }
1773 case SMART_ACTION_WP_RESUME:
1774 {
1775 if (!IsSmart())
1776 break;
1777
1778 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetWPPauseTimer(0);
1779 break;
1780 }
1781 case SMART_ACTION_SET_ORIENTATION:
1782 {
1783 if (!me)
1784 break;
1785
1786 if (e.action.orientation.random > 0)
1787 {
1788 float randomOri = frand(0.0f, 2 * M_PI);
1789 me->SetFacingTo(randomOri);
1790 if (e.action.orientation.quickChange)
1791 me->SetOrientation(randomOri);
1792 break;
1793 }
1794
1795 if (e.action.orientation.turnAngle)
1796 {
1797 float turnOri = me->GetOrientation() + (static_cast<float>(e.action.orientation.turnAngle) * M_PI / 180.0f);
1798 me->SetFacingTo(turnOri);
1799 if (e.action.orientation.quickChange)
1800 me->SetOrientation(turnOri);
1801 break;
1802 }
1803
1804 if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_SELF)
1805 {
1806 me->SetFacingTo((me->HasUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_ONTRANSPORT) && me->GetTransGUID() ? me->GetTransportHomePosition() : me->GetHomePosition()).GetOrientation());
1807 if (e.action.orientation.quickChange)
1808 me->SetOrientation((me->HasUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_ONTRANSPORT) && me->GetTransGUID() ? me->GetTransportHomePosition() : me->GetHomePosition()).GetOrientation());
1809 }
1810 else if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_POSITION)
1811 {
1812 me->SetFacingTo(e.target.o);
1813 if (e.action.orientation.quickChange)
1814 me->SetOrientation(e.target.o);
1815 }
1816 else if (!targets.empty())
1817 {
1818 me->SetFacingToObject(*targets.begin());
1819 if (e.action.orientation.quickChange)
1820 me->SetInFront(*targets.begin());
1821 }
1822
1823 break;
1824 }
1825 case SMART_ACTION_PLAYMOVIE:
1826 {
1827 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1828 {
1829 if (!IsPlayer(target))
1830 continue;
1831
1832 target->ToPlayer()->SendMovieStart(e.action.movie.entry);
1833 }
1834 break;
1835 }
1836 case SMART_ACTION_MOVE_TO_POS:
1837 {
1838 if (!IsSmart())
1839 break;
1840
1841 WorldObject* target = nullptr;
1842
1843 switch (e.GetTargetType())
1844 {
1845 case SMART_TARGET_POSITION:
1846 {
1847 G3D::Vector3 dest(e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z);
1848 if (e.action.moveToPos.transport)
1849 if (TransportBase* trans = me->GetDirectTransport())
1850 trans->CalculatePassengerPosition(dest.x, dest.y, dest.z);
1851
1852 me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(e.action.moveToPos.pointId, dest.x, dest.y, dest.z, true, true,
1853 isControlled ? MOTION_SLOT_CONTROLLED : MOTION_SLOT_ACTIVE, e.target.o);
1854
1855 break;
1856 }
1857 case SMART_TARGET_RANDOM_POINT:
1858 {
1859 if (me)
1860 {
1861 float range = (float)e.target.randomPoint.range;
1862 Position srcPos = { e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o };
1863 Position randomPoint = me->GetRandomPoint(srcPos, range);
1864 me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(
1865 e.action.moveToPos.pointId,
1866 randomPoint.m_positionX,
1867 randomPoint.m_positionY,
1868 randomPoint.m_positionZ,
1869 true,
1870 true,
1871 isControlled ? MOTION_SLOT_CONTROLLED : MOTION_SLOT_ACTIVE
1872 );
1873
1874 }
1875
1876 break;
1877 }
1878 // Can use target floats as offset
1879 default:
1880 {
1881 // we want to move to random element
1882 if (targets.empty())
1883 return;
1884 else
1885 target = Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(targets);
1886
1887 float x, y, z;
1888 target->GetPosition(x, y, z);
1889
1890 if (e.action.moveToPos.combatReach)
1891 target->GetNearPoint(me, x, y, z, target->GetCombatReach() + e.action.moveToPos.ContactDistance, 0, target->GetAngle(me));
1892 else if (e.action.moveToPos.ContactDistance)
1893 target->GetNearPoint(me, x, y, z, e.action.moveToPos.ContactDistance, 0, target->GetAngle(me));
1894
1895 me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(e.action.moveToPos.pointId, x + e.target.x, y + e.target.y, z + e.target.z, true, true, isControlled ? MOTION_SLOT_CONTROLLED : MOTION_SLOT_ACTIVE);
1896
1897 break;
1898 }
1899 }
1900
1901 break;
1902 }
1903 case SMART_ACTION_MOVE_TO_POS_TARGET:
1904 {
1905 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1906 {
1907 if (IsCreature(target))
1908 {
1909 Creature* ctarget = target->ToCreature();
1910 ctarget->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(e.action.moveToPos.pointId, e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, true, true, isControlled ? MOTION_SLOT_CONTROLLED : MOTION_SLOT_ACTIVE);
1911 }
1912 }
1913
1914 break;
1915 }
1916 case SMART_ACTION_RESPAWN_TARGET:
1917 {
1918 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1919 {
1920 if (IsCreature(target))
1921 target->ToCreature()->Respawn();
1922 else if (IsGameObject(target))
1923 {
1924 // do not modify respawndelay of already spawned gameobjects
1925 if (target->ToGameObject()->isSpawnedByDefault())
1926 target->ToGameObject()->Respawn();
1927 else
1928 target->ToGameObject()->SetRespawnTime(e.action.RespawnTarget.goRespawnTime);
1929 }
1930 }
1931 break;
1932 }
1933 case SMART_ACTION_CLOSE_GOSSIP:
1934 {
1935 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1936 if (IsPlayer(target))
1937 target->ToPlayer()->PlayerTalkClass->SendCloseGossip();
1938 break;
1939 }
1940 case SMART_ACTION_EQUIP:
1941 {
1942 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
1943 {
1944 if (Creature* npc = target->ToCreature())
1945 {
1946 std::array<uint32, MAX_EQUIPMENT_ITEMS> slot;
1947 if (int8 equipId = static_cast<int8>(e.action.equip.entry))
1948 {
1949 EquipmentInfo const* eInfo = sObjectMgr->GetEquipmentInfo(npc->GetEntry(), equipId);
1950 if (!eInfo)
1951 {
1952 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: SMART_ACTION_EQUIP uses non-existent equipment info id {} for creature {}", equipId, npc->GetEntry());
1953 break;
1954 }
1955
1956 npc->SetCurrentEquipmentId(equipId);
1957
1958 std::copy(std::begin(eInfo->ItemEntry), std::end(eInfo->ItemEntry), std::begin(slot));
1959 }
1960 else
1961 std::copy(std::begin(e.action.equip.slots), std::end(e.action.equip.slots), std::begin(slot));
1962
1963 for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_EQUIPMENT_ITEMS; ++i)
1964 if (!e.action.equip.mask || (e.action.equip.mask & (1 << i)))
1965 npc->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_VIRTUAL_ITEM_SLOT_ID + i, slot[i]);
1966 }
1967 }
1968 break;
1969 }
1970 case SMART_ACTION_CREATE_TIMED_EVENT:
1971 {
1972 SmartEvent ne = SmartEvent();
1973 ne.type = (SMART_EVENT)SMART_EVENT_UPDATE;
1974 ne.event_chance = e.action.timeEvent.chance;
1975 if (!ne.event_chance) ne.event_chance = 100;
1976
1977 ne.minMaxRepeat.min = e.action.timeEvent.min;
1978 ne.minMaxRepeat.max = e.action.timeEvent.max;
1979 ne.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin = e.action.timeEvent.repeatMin;
1980 ne.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax = e.action.timeEvent.repeatMax;
1981
1982 ne.event_flags = 0;
1983 if (!ne.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin && !ne.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax)
1984 ne.event_flags |= SMART_EVENT_FLAG_NOT_REPEATABLE;
1985
1986 SmartAction ac = SmartAction();
1987 ac.type = (SMART_ACTION)SMART_ACTION_TRIGGER_TIMED_EVENT;
1988 ac.timeEvent.id = e.action.timeEvent.id;
1989
1990 SmartScriptHolder ev = SmartScriptHolder();
1991 ev.event = ne;
1992 ev.event_id = e.action.timeEvent.id;
1993 ev.target = e.target;
1994 ev.action = ac;
1995 InitTimer(ev);
1996 mStoredEvents.push_back(ev);
1997 break;
1998 }
1999 case SMART_ACTION_TRIGGER_TIMED_EVENT:
2000 ProcessEventsFor((SMART_EVENT)SMART_EVENT_TIMED_EVENT_TRIGGERED, nullptr, e.action.timeEvent.id);
2001
2002 // xinef: remove this event if not repeatable
2003 if (e.event.event_flags & SMART_EVENT_FLAG_NOT_REPEATABLE)
2004 mRemIDs.push_back(e.action.timeEvent.id);
2005 break;
2006 case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_TIMED_EVENT:
2007 mRemIDs.push_back(e.action.timeEvent.id);
2008 break;
2009 case SMART_ACTION_OVERRIDE_SCRIPT_BASE_OBJECT:
2010 {
2011 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2012 {
2013 if (IsCreature(target))
2014 {
2015 if (!meOrigGUID)
2016 meOrigGUID = me ? me->GetGUID() : ObjectGuid::Empty;
2017 if (!goOrigGUID)
2018 goOrigGUID = go ? go->GetGUID() : ObjectGuid::Empty;
2019 go = nullptr;
2020 me = target->ToCreature();
2021 break;
2022 }
2023 else if (IsGameObject(target))
2024 {
2025 if (!meOrigGUID)
2026 meOrigGUID = me ? me->GetGUID() : ObjectGuid::Empty;
2027 if (!goOrigGUID)
2028 goOrigGUID = go ? go->GetGUID() : ObjectGuid::Empty;
2029 go = target->ToGameObject();
2030 me = nullptr;
2031 break;
2032 }
2033 }
2034
2035 break;
2036 }
2037 case SMART_ACTION_RESET_SCRIPT_BASE_OBJECT:
2038 ResetBaseObject();
2039 break;
2040 case SMART_ACTION_CALL_SCRIPT_RESET:
2041 OnReset();
2042 break;
2043 case SMART_ACTION_SET_RANGED_MOVEMENT:
2044 {
2045 if (!IsSmart())
2046 break;
2047
2048 float attackDistance = float(e.action.setRangedMovement.distance);
2049 float attackAngle = float(e.action.setRangedMovement.angle) / 180.0f * float(M_PI);
2050
2051 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2052 if (Creature* creature = target->ToCreature())
2053 if (IsSmart(creature) && creature->GetVictim())
2054 if (CAST_AI(SmartAI, creature->AI())->CanCombatMove())
2055 creature->GetMotionMaster()->MoveChase(creature->GetVictim(), attackDistance, attackAngle);
2056
2057 break;
2058 }
2059 case SMART_ACTION_CALL_TIMED_ACTIONLIST:
2060 {
2061 if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_NONE)
2062 {
2063 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} is using TARGET_NONE(0) for Script9 target. Please correct target_type in database.", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.GetEventType(), e.GetActionType());
2064 break;
2065 }
2066
2067 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2068 {
2069 if (Creature* creature = target->ToCreature())
2070 {
2071 if (IsSmart(creature))
2072 CAST_AI(SmartAI, creature->AI())->SetScript9(e, e.action.timedActionList.id, GetLastInvoker());
2073 }
2074 else if (GameObject* go = target->ToGameObject())
2075 {
2076 if (IsSmart(go))
2077 CAST_AI(SmartGameObjectAI, go->AI())->SetScript9(e, e.action.timedActionList.id, GetLastInvoker());
2078 }
2079 }
2080 break;
2081 }
2082 case SMART_ACTION_SET_NPC_FLAG:
2083 {
2084 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2085 if (IsCreature(target))
2086 target->ToUnit()->ReplaceAllNpcFlags(NPCFlags(e.action.unitFlag.flag));
2087 break;
2088 }
2089 case SMART_ACTION_ADD_NPC_FLAG:
2090 {
2091 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2092 if (IsCreature(target))
2093 target->ToUnit()->SetNpcFlag(NPCFlags(e.action.unitFlag.flag));
2094 break;
2095 }
2096 case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_NPC_FLAG:
2097 {
2098 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2099 if (IsCreature(target))
2100 target->ToUnit()->RemoveNpcFlag(NPCFlags(e.action.unitFlag.flag));
2101 break;
2102 }
2103 case SMART_ACTION_CROSS_CAST:
2104 {
2105 if (targets.empty())
2106 break;
2107
2108 ObjectVector casters;
2109 GetTargets(casters, CreateSmartEvent(SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, (SMARTAI_TARGETS)e.action.crossCast.targetType, e.action.crossCast.targetParam1, e.action.crossCast.targetParam2, e.action.crossCast.targetParam3, 0, 0), unit);
2110
2111 for (WorldObject* caster : casters)
2112 {
2113 if (!IsUnit(caster))
2114 continue;
2115
2116 Unit* casterUnit = caster->ToUnit();
2117
2118 bool interruptedSpell = false;
2119
2120 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2121 {
2122 if (!IsUnit(target))
2123 continue;
2124
2125 if (!(e.action.crossCast.flags & SMARTCAST_AURA_NOT_PRESENT) || !target->ToUnit()->HasAura(e.action.crossCast.spell))
2126 {
2127 if (!interruptedSpell && e.action.crossCast.flags & SMARTCAST_INTERRUPT_PREVIOUS)
2128 {
2129 casterUnit->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
2130 interruptedSpell = true;
2131 }
2132
2133 casterUnit->CastSpell(target->ToUnit(), e.action.crossCast.spell, (e.action.crossCast.flags & SMARTCAST_TRIGGERED) != 0);
2134 }
2135 else
2136 LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai", "Spell {} not cast because it has flag SMARTCAST_AURA_NOT_PRESENT and the target ({}) already has the aura", e.action.crossCast.spell, target->GetGUID().ToString());
2137 }
2138 }
2139 break;
2140 }
2141 case SMART_ACTION_CALL_RANDOM_TIMED_ACTIONLIST:
2142 {
2143 std::vector<uint32> actionLists;
2144 std::copy_if(e.action.randTimedActionList.actionLists.begin(), e.action.randTimedActionList.actionLists.end(),
2145 std::back_inserter(actionLists), [](uint32 actionList) { return actionList != 0; });
2146
2147 uint32 id = Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(actionLists);
2148 if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_NONE)
2149 {
2150 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} is using TARGET_NONE(0) for Script9 target. Please correct target_type in database.", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.GetEventType(), e.GetActionType());
2151 break;
2152 }
2153
2154 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2155 {
2156 if (Creature* creature = target->ToCreature())
2157 {
2158 if (IsSmart(creature))
2159 CAST_AI(SmartAI, creature->AI())->SetScript9(e, id, GetLastInvoker());
2160 }
2161 else if (GameObject* go = target->ToGameObject())
2162 {
2163 if (IsSmart(go))
2164 CAST_AI(SmartGameObjectAI, go->AI())->SetScript9(e, id, GetLastInvoker());
2165 }
2166 }
2167 break;
2168 }
2169 case SMART_ACTION_CALL_RANDOM_RANGE_TIMED_ACTIONLIST:
2170 {
2171 uint32 id = urand(e.action.randTimedActionList.actionLists[0], e.action.randTimedActionList.actionLists[1]);
2172 if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_NONE)
2173 {
2174 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} is using TARGET_NONE(0) for Script9 target. Please correct target_type in database.", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.GetEventType(), e.GetActionType());
2175 break;
2176 }
2177
2178 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2179 {
2180 if (Creature* creature = target->ToCreature())
2181 {
2182 if (IsSmart(creature))
2183 CAST_AI(SmartAI, creature->AI())->SetScript9(e, id, GetLastInvoker());
2184 }
2185 else if (GameObject* go = target->ToGameObject())
2186 {
2187 if (IsSmart(go))
2188 CAST_AI(SmartGameObjectAI, go->AI())->SetScript9(e, id, GetLastInvoker());
2189 }
2190 }
2191 break;
2192 }
2193 case SMART_ACTION_ACTIVATE_TAXI:
2194 {
2195 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2196 if (IsPlayer(target))
2197 target->ToPlayer()->ActivateTaxiPathTo(e.action.taxi.id);
2198 break;
2199 }
2200 case SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_MOVE:
2201 {
2202 bool foundTarget = false;
2203
2204 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2205 {
2206 if (IsCreature((target)))
2207 {
2208 foundTarget = true;
2209
2210 if (e.action.moveRandom.distance)
2211 target->ToCreature()->GetMotionMaster()->MoveRandom(float(e.action.moveRandom.distance));
2212 else
2213 target->ToCreature()->GetMotionMaster()->MoveIdle();
2214 }
2215 }
2216
2217 if (!foundTarget && me && IsCreature(me) && me->IsAlive())
2218 {
2219 if (e.action.moveRandom.distance)
2220 me->GetMotionMaster()->MoveRandom(float(e.action.moveRandom.distance));
2221 else
2222 me->GetMotionMaster()->MoveIdle();
2223 }
2224 break;
2225 }
2226 case SMART_ACTION_SET_UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1:
2227 {
2228 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2229 if (IsUnit(target))
2230 target->ToUnit()->SetByteFlag(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, e.action.setunitByte.type, e.action.setunitByte.byte1);
2231 break;
2232 }
2233 case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1:
2234 {
2235 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2236 if (IsUnit(target))
2237 target->ToUnit()->RemoveByteFlag(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, e.action.delunitByte.type, e.action.delunitByte.byte1);
2238 break;
2239 }
2240 case SMART_ACTION_INTERRUPT_SPELL:
2241 {
2242 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2243 if (IsUnit(target))
2244 target->ToUnit()->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(e.action.interruptSpellCasting.withDelayed != 0, e.action.interruptSpellCasting.spell_id, e.action.interruptSpellCasting.withInstant != 0);
2245 break;
2246 }
2247 case SMART_ACTION_SEND_GO_CUSTOM_ANIM:
2248 {
2249 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2250 if (IsGameObject(target))
2251 target->ToGameObject()->SendCustomAnim(e.action.sendGoCustomAnim.anim);
2252 break;
2253 }
2254 case SMART_ACTION_SET_DYNAMIC_FLAG:
2255 {
2256 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2257 if (IsUnit(target))
2258 target->ToUnit()->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
2259 break;
2260 }
2261 case SMART_ACTION_ADD_DYNAMIC_FLAG:
2262 {
2263 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2264 if (IsUnit(target))
2265 target->ToUnit()->SetFlag(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
2266 break;
2267 }
2268 case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_DYNAMIC_FLAG:
2269 {
2270 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2271 if (IsUnit(target))
2272 target->ToUnit()->RemoveFlag(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
2273 break;
2274 }
2275 case SMART_ACTION_JUMP_TO_POS:
2276 {
2277 if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_RANDOM_POINT)
2278 {
2279 if (me)
2280 {
2281 float range = (float)e.target.randomPoint.range;
2282 Position srcPos = { e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o };
2283 Position randomPoint = me->GetRandomPoint(srcPos, range);
2284 me->GetMotionMaster()->MoveJump(randomPoint, (float)e.action.jump.speedxy, (float)e.action.jump.speedz);
2285 }
2286
2287 break;
2288 }
2289
2290 if (targets.empty())
2291 break;
2292
2293 // xinef: my implementation
2294 if (e.action.jump.selfJump)
2295 {
2296 if (WorldObject* target = Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(targets))
2297 if (me)
2298 me->GetMotionMaster()->MoveJump(target->GetPositionX() + e.target.x, target->GetPositionY() + e.target.y, target->GetPositionZ() + e.target.z, (float)e.action.jump.speedxy, (float)e.action.jump.speedz);
2299 }
2300 else
2301 {
2302 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2303 if (WorldObject* obj = (target))
2304 {
2305 if (Creature* creature = obj->ToCreature())
2306 creature->GetMotionMaster()->MoveJump(e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, (float)e.action.jump.speedxy, (float)e.action.jump.speedz);
2307 }
2308 }
2309
2310 break;
2311 }
2312 case SMART_ACTION_GO_SET_LOOT_STATE:
2313 {
2314 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2315 if (IsGameObject(target))
2316 target->ToGameObject()->SetLootState((LootState)e.action.setGoLootState.state);
2317 break;
2318 }
2319 case SMART_ACTION_GO_SET_GO_STATE:
2320 {
2321 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2322 if (IsGameObject(target))
2323 target->ToGameObject()->SetGoState((GOState)e.action.goState.state);
2324 break;
2325 }
2326 case SMART_ACTION_SEND_TARGET_TO_TARGET:
2327 {
2328 WorldObject* ref = GetBaseObject();
2329
2330 if (!ref)
2331 ref = unit;
2332
2333 if (!ref)
2334 break;
2335
2336 ObjectVector const* storedTargets = GetStoredTargetVector(e.action.sendTargetToTarget.id, *ref);
2337 if (!storedTargets)
2338 break;
2339
2340 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2341 {
2342 if (IsCreature(target))
2343 {
2344 if (SmartAI* ai = CAST_AI(SmartAI, target->ToCreature()->AI()))
2345 ai->GetScript()->StoreTargetList(ObjectVector(*storedTargets), e.action.sendTargetToTarget.id); // store a copy of target list
2346 else
2347 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Action target for SMART_ACTION_SEND_TARGET_TO_TARGET is not using SmartAI, skipping");
2348 }
2349 else if (IsGameObject(target))
2350 {
2351 if (SmartGameObjectAI* ai = CAST_AI(SmartGameObjectAI, target->ToGameObject()->AI()))
2352 ai->GetScript()->StoreTargetList(ObjectVector(*storedTargets), e.action.sendTargetToTarget.id); // store a copy of target list
2353 else
2354 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Action target for SMART_ACTION_SEND_TARGET_TO_TARGET is not using SmartGameObjectAI, skipping");
2355 }
2356 }
2357 break;
2358 }
2359 case SMART_ACTION_SEND_GOSSIP_MENU:
2360 {
2361 if (!GetBaseObject())
2362 break;
2363
2364 LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SEND_GOSSIP_MENU: gossipMenuId {}, gossipNpcTextId {}",
2365 e.action.sendGossipMenu.gossipMenuId, e.action.sendGossipMenu.gossipNpcTextId);
2366
2367 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2368 if (Player* player = target->ToPlayer())
2369 {
2370 if (e.action.sendGossipMenu.gossipMenuId)
2371 player->PrepareGossipMenu(GetBaseObject(), e.action.sendGossipMenu.gossipMenuId, true);
2372 else
2373 ClearGossipMenuFor(player);
2374
2375 SendGossipMenuFor(player, e.action.sendGossipMenu.gossipNpcTextId, GetBaseObject()->GetGUID());
2376 }
2377
2378 break;
2379 }
2380 case SMART_ACTION_SET_HOME_POS:
2381 {
2382 if (!targets.empty())
2383 {
2384 float x, y, z, o;
2385 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2386 if (IsCreature(target))
2387 {
2388 if (e.action.setHomePos.spawnPos)
2389 {
2390 target->ToCreature()->GetRespawnPosition(x, y, z, &o);
2391 target->ToCreature()->SetHomePosition(x, y, z, o);
2392 }
2393 else
2394 target->ToCreature()->SetHomePosition(target->GetPositionX(), target->GetPositionY(), target->GetPositionZ(), target->GetOrientation());
2395 }
2396 }
2397 else if (me && e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_POSITION)
2398 {
2399 if (e.action.setHomePos.spawnPos)
2400 {
2401 float x, y, z, o;
2402 me->GetRespawnPosition(x, y, z, &o);
2403 me->SetHomePosition(x, y, z, o);
2404 }
2405 else
2406 me->SetHomePosition(e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o);
2407 }
2408 break;
2409 }
2410 case SMART_ACTION_SET_HEALTH_REGEN:
2411 {
2412 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2413 if (IsCreature(target))
2414 target->ToCreature()->SetRegeneratingHealth(e.action.setHealthRegen.regenHealth);
2415
2416 break;
2417 }
2418 case SMART_ACTION_SET_ROOT:
2419 {
2420 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2421 if (IsCreature(target))
2422 target->ToCreature()->SetControlled(e.action.setRoot.root != 0, UNIT_STATE_ROOT);
2423 break;
2424 }
2425 case SMART_ACTION_SET_GO_FLAG:
2426 {
2427 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2428 if (IsGameObject(target))
2429 target->ToGameObject()->SetUInt32Value(GAMEOBJECT_FLAGS, e.action.goFlag.flag);
2430 break;
2431 }
2432 case SMART_ACTION_ADD_GO_FLAG:
2433 {
2434 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2435 if (IsGameObject(target))
2436 target->ToGameObject()->SetFlag(GAMEOBJECT_FLAGS, e.action.goFlag.flag);
2437 break;
2438 }
2439 case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_GO_FLAG:
2440 {
2441 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2442 if (IsGameObject(target))
2443 target->ToGameObject()->RemoveFlag(GAMEOBJECT_FLAGS, e.action.goFlag.flag);
2444 break;
2445 }
2446 case SMART_ACTION_SUMMON_CREATURE_GROUP:
2447 {
2448 std::list<TempSummon*> summonList;
2449 GetBaseObject()->SummonCreatureGroup(e.action.creatureGroup.group, &summonList);
2450
2451 for (std::list<TempSummon*>::const_iterator itr = summonList.begin(); itr != summonList.end(); ++itr)
2452 {
2453 if (unit && e.action.creatureGroup.attackInvoker)
2454 (*itr)->AI()->AttackStart(unit);
2455 else if (me && e.action.creatureGroup.attackScriptOwner)
2456 (*itr)->AI()->AttackStart(me);
2457 }
2458
2459 break;
2460 }
2461 case SMART_ACTION_SET_POWER:
2462 {
2463 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2464 if (IsUnit(target))
2465 target->ToUnit()->SetPower(Powers(e.action.power.powerType), e.action.power.newPower);
2466 break;
2467 }
2468 case SMART_ACTION_ADD_POWER:
2469 {
2470 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2471 if (IsUnit(target))
2472 target->ToUnit()->SetPower(Powers(e.action.power.powerType), target->ToUnit()->GetPower(Powers(e.action.power.powerType)) + e.action.power.newPower);
2473 break;
2474 }
2475 case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_POWER:
2476 {
2477 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2478 if (IsUnit(target))
2479 target->ToUnit()->SetPower(Powers(e.action.power.powerType), target->ToUnit()->GetPower(Powers(e.action.power.powerType)) - e.action.power.newPower);
2480 break;
2481 }
2482 case SMART_ACTION_GAME_EVENT_STOP:
2483 {
2484 uint32 eventId = e.action.gameEventStop.id;
2485 if (!sGameEventMgr->IsActiveEvent(eventId))
2486 {
2487 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: At case SMART_ACTION_GAME_EVENT_STOP, inactive event (id: {})", eventId);
2488 break;
2489 }
2490 sGameEventMgr->StopEvent(eventId, true);
2491 break;
2492 }
2493 case SMART_ACTION_GAME_EVENT_START:
2494 {
2495 uint32 eventId = e.action.gameEventStart.id;
2496 if (sGameEventMgr->IsActiveEvent(eventId))
2497 {
2498 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: At case SMART_ACTION_GAME_EVENT_START, already activated event (id: {})", eventId);
2499 break;
2500 }
2501 sGameEventMgr->StartEvent(eventId, true);
2502 break;
2503 }
2504 case SMART_ACTION_START_CLOSEST_WAYPOINT:
2505 {
2506 std::vector<uint32> waypoints;
2507 std::copy_if(e.action.closestWaypointFromList.wps.begin(), e.action.closestWaypointFromList.wps.end(),
2508 std::back_inserter(waypoints), [](uint32 wp) { return wp != 0; });
2509
2510 float distanceToClosest = std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
2511 WayPoint* closestWp = nullptr;
2512
2513 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2514 {
2515 if (Creature* creature = target->ToCreature())
2516 {
2517 if (IsSmart(creature))
2518 {
2519 for (uint32 wp : waypoints)
2520 {
2521 WPPath* path = sSmartWaypointMgr->GetPath(wp);
2522 if (!path || path->empty())
2523 continue;
2524
2525 auto itrWp = path->find(0);
2526 if (itrWp != path->end())
2527 {
2528 if (WayPoint* wp = itrWp->second)
2529 {
2530 float distToThisPath = creature->GetDistance(wp->x, wp->y, wp->z);
2531 if (distToThisPath < distanceToClosest)
2532 {
2533 distanceToClosest = distToThisPath;
2534 closestWp = wp;
2535 }
2536 }
2537 }
2538 }
2539
2540 if (closestWp)
2541 CAST_AI(SmartAI, creature->AI())->StartPath(false, closestWp->id, true);
2542 }
2543 }
2544 }
2545 break;
2546 }
2547 case SMART_ACTION_EXIT_VEHICLE:
2548 {
2549 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2550 if (IsUnit(target))
2551 target->ToUnit()->ExitVehicle();
2552
2553 break;
2554 }
2555 case SMART_ACTION_SET_UNIT_MOVEMENT_FLAGS:
2556 {
2557 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2558 if (IsUnit(target))
2559 {
2560 target->ToUnit()->SetUnitMovementFlags(e.action.movementFlag.flag);
2561 target->ToUnit()->SendMovementFlagUpdate();
2562 }
2563
2564 break;
2565 }
2566 case SMART_ACTION_SET_COMBAT_DISTANCE:
2567 {
2568 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2569 if (IsCreature(target))
2570 target->ToCreature()->m_CombatDistance = e.action.combatDistance.dist;
2571
2572 break;
2573 }
2574 case SMART_ACTION_SET_SIGHT_DIST:
2575 {
2576 for (WorldObject* const target : targets)
2577 if (IsCreature(target))
2578 target->ToCreature()->m_SightDistance = e.action.sightDistance.dist;
2579 break;
2580 }
2581 case SMART_ACTION_FLEE:
2582 {
2583 for (WorldObject* const target : targets)
2584 if (IsCreature(target))
2585 target->ToCreature()->GetMotionMaster()->MoveFleeing(me, e.action.flee.withEmote);
2586 break;
2587 }
2588 case SMART_ACTION_ADD_THREAT:
2589 {
2590 for (WorldObject* const target : targets)
2591 if (IsUnit(target))
2592 me->AddThreat(target->ToUnit(), float(e.action.threatPCT.threatINC) - float(e.action.threatPCT.threatDEC));
2593 break;
2594 }
2595 case SMART_ACTION_LOAD_EQUIPMENT:
2596 {
2597 for (WorldObject* const target : targets)
2598 if (IsCreature(target))
2599 target->ToCreature()->LoadEquipment(e.action.loadEquipment.id, e.action.loadEquipment.force != 0);
2600 break;
2601 }
2602 case SMART_ACTION_TRIGGER_RANDOM_TIMED_EVENT:
2603 {
2604 uint32 eventId = urand(e.action.randomTimedEvent.minId, e.action.randomTimedEvent.maxId);
2605 ProcessEventsFor((SMART_EVENT)SMART_EVENT_TIMED_EVENT_TRIGGERED, nullptr, eventId);
2606 break;
2607 }
2608 case SMART_ACTION_DISMOUNT:
2609 {
2610 for (WorldObject* const target : targets)
2611 if (IsUnit(target))
2612 target->ToUnit()->Dismount();
2613 break;
2614 }
2615 case SMART_ACTION_SET_HOVER:
2616 {
2617 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2618 if (IsUnit(target))
2619 target->ToUnit()->SetHover(e.action.setHover.state);
2620 break;
2621 }
2622 case SMART_ACTION_ADD_IMMUNITY:
2623 {
2624 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2625 if (IsUnit(target))
2626 target->ToUnit()->ApplySpellImmune(e.action.immunity.id, e.action.immunity.type, e.action.immunity.value, true);
2627
2628 break;
2629 }
2630 case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_IMMUNITY:
2631 {
2632 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2633 if (IsUnit(target))
2634 target->ToUnit()->ApplySpellImmune(e.action.immunity.id, e.action.immunity.type, e.action.immunity.value, false);
2635 break;
2636 }
2637 case SMART_ACTION_FALL:
2638 {
2639 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2640 if (IsUnit(target))
2641 target->ToUnit()->GetMotionMaster()->MoveFall();
2642
2643 break;
2644 }
2645 case SMART_ACTION_SET_EVENT_FLAG_RESET:
2646 {
2647 SetPhaseReset(e.action.setActive.state);
2648 break;
2649 }
2650 case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_ALL_GAMEOBJECTS:
2651 {
2652 for (WorldObject* const target : targets)
2653 if (IsUnit(target))
2654 target->ToUnit()->RemoveAllGameObjects();
2655 break;
2656 }
2657 case SMART_ACTION_STOP_MOTION:
2658 {
2659 for (WorldObject* const target : targets)
2660 {
2661 if (IsUnit(target))
2662 {
2663 if (e.action.stopMotion.stopMovement)
2664 target->ToUnit()->StopMoving();
2665 if (e.action.stopMotion.movementExpired)
2666 target->ToUnit()->GetMotionMaster()->MovementExpired();
2667 }
2668 }
2669 break;
2670 }
2671 case SMART_ACTION_NO_ENVIRONMENT_UPDATE:
2672 {
2673 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2674 if (IsUnit(target))
2675 target->ToUnit()->AddUnitState(UNIT_STATE_NO_ENVIRONMENT_UPD);
2676
2677 break;
2678 }
2679 case SMART_ACTION_ZONE_UNDER_ATTACK:
2680 {
2681 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2682 if (IsUnit(target))
2683 if (Player* player = target->ToUnit()->GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself())
2684 {
2685 me->SendZoneUnderAttackMessage(player);
2686 break;
2687 }
2688
2689 break;
2690 }
2691 case SMART_ACTION_LOAD_GRID:
2692 {
2693 if (me && me->FindMap())
2694 me->FindMap()->LoadGrid(e.target.x, e.target.y);
2695 break;
2696 }
2697 case SMART_ACTION_PLAYER_TALK:
2698 {
2699 std::string text = sObjectMgr->GetAcoreString(e.action.playerTalk.textId, DEFAULT_LOCALE);
2700
2701 if (!targets.empty())
2702 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2703 if (IsPlayer(target))
2704 !e.action.playerTalk.flag ? target->ToPlayer()->Say(text, LANG_UNIVERSAL) : target->ToPlayer()->Yell(text, LANG_UNIVERSAL);
2705
2706 break;
2707 }
2708 case SMART_ACTION_CUSTOM_CAST:
2709 {
2710 if (!me)
2711 break;
2712
2713 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2714 {
2715 if (IsUnit(target))
2716 {
2717 if (e.action.castCustom.flags & SMARTCAST_INTERRUPT_PREVIOUS)
2718 {
2719 me->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
2720 }
2721
2722 if (e.action.castCustom.flags & SMARTCAST_COMBAT_MOVE)
2723 {
2724 // If cast flag SMARTCAST_COMBAT_MOVE is set combat movement will not be allowed
2725 // unless target is outside spell range, out of mana, or LOS.
2726
2727 bool _allowMove = false;
2728 SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(e.action.castCustom.spell); // AssertSpellInfo?
2729 int32 mana = me->GetPower(POWER_MANA);
2730
2731 if (me->GetDistance(target->ToUnit()) > spellInfo->GetMaxRange(true) ||
2732 me->GetDistance(target->ToUnit()) < spellInfo->GetMinRange(true) ||
2733 !me->IsWithinLOSInMap(target->ToUnit()) ||
2734 mana < spellInfo->CalcPowerCost(me, spellInfo->GetSchoolMask()))
2735 _allowMove = true;
2736
2737 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetCombatMove(_allowMove);
2738 }
2739
2740 if (!(e.action.castCustom.flags & SMARTCAST_AURA_NOT_PRESENT) || !target->ToUnit()->HasAura(e.action.castCustom.spell))
2741 {
2742 CustomSpellValues values;
2743 if (e.action.castCustom.bp1)
2744 values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT0, e.action.castCustom.bp1);
2745 if (e.action.castCustom.bp2)
2746 values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT1, e.action.castCustom.bp2);
2747 if (e.action.castCustom.bp3)
2748 values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT2, e.action.castCustom.bp3);
2749 me->CastCustomSpell(e.action.castCustom.spell, values, target->ToUnit(), (e.action.castCustom.flags & SMARTCAST_TRIGGERED) ? TRIGGERED_FULL_MASK : TRIGGERED_NONE);
2750 }
2751 }
2752 }
2753 break;
2754 }
2755 case SMART_ACTION_VORTEX_SUMMON:
2756 {
2757 if (!me)
2758 break;
2759
2760 if (targets.empty())
2761 break;
2762
2763 TempSummonType summon_type = (e.action.summonVortex.summonDuration > 0) ? TEMPSUMMON_TIMED_DESPAWN : TEMPSUMMON_CORPSE_DESPAWN;
2764
2765 float a = static_cast<float>(e.action.summonVortex.a);
2766 float k = static_cast<float>(e.action.summonVortex.k) / 1000.0f;
2767 float r_max = static_cast<float>(e.action.summonVortex.r_max);
2768 float delta_phi = M_PI * static_cast<float>(e.action.summonVortex.phi_delta) / 180.0f;
2769
2770 // r(phi) = a * e ^ (k * phi)
2771 // r(phi + delta_phi) = a * e ^ (k * (phi + delta_phi))
2772 // r(phi + delta_phi) = a * e ^ (k * phi) * e ^ (k * delta_phi)
2773 // r(phi + delta_phi) = r(phi) * e ^ (k * delta_phi)
2774 float factor = std::exp(k * delta_phi);
2775
2776 // r(0) = a * e ^ (k * 0) = a * e ^ 0 = a * 1 = a
2777 float summonRadius = a;
2778
2779 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2780 {
2781 // Offset by orientation, should not count into radius calculation,
2782 // but is needed for vortex direction (polar coordinates)
2783 float phi = target->GetOrientation();
2784
2785 do
2786 {
2787 Position summonPosition(*target);
2788 summonPosition.RelocatePolarOffset(phi, summonRadius);
2789
2790 me->SummonCreature(e.action.summonVortex.summonEntry, summonPosition, summon_type, e.action.summonVortex.summonDuration);
2791
2792 phi += delta_phi;
2793 summonRadius *= factor;
2794 } while (summonRadius <= r_max);
2795 }
2796
2797 break;
2798 }
2799 case SMART_ACTION_CONE_SUMMON:
2800 {
2801 if (!me)
2802 break;
2803
2804 TempSummonType spawnType = (e.action.coneSummon.summonDuration > 0) ? TEMPSUMMON_TIMED_DESPAWN : TEMPSUMMON_CORPSE_DESPAWN;
2805
2806 float distInARow = static_cast<float>(e.action.coneSummon.distanceBetweenSummons);
2807 float coneAngle = static_cast<float>(e.action.coneSummon.coneAngle) * M_PI / 180.0f;
2808
2809 for (uint32 radius = 0; radius <= e.action.coneSummon.coneLength; radius += e.action.coneSummon.distanceBetweenRings)
2810 {
2811 float deltaAngle = 0.0f;
2812 if (radius > 0)
2813 deltaAngle = distInARow / radius;
2814
2815 uint32 count = 1;
2816 if (deltaAngle > 0)
2817 count += coneAngle / deltaAngle;
2818
2819 float currentAngle = -static_cast<float>(count) * deltaAngle / 2.0f;
2820
2821 if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_SELF || e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_NONE)
2822 currentAngle += G3D::fuzzyGt(e.target.o, 0.0f) ? (e.target.o - me->GetOrientation()) : 0.0f;
2823 else if (!targets.empty())
2824 {
2825 currentAngle += (me->GetAngle(targets.front()) - me->GetOrientation());
2826 }
2827
2828 for (uint32 index = 0; index < count; ++index)
2829 {
2830 Position spawnPosition(*me);
2831 spawnPosition.RelocatePolarOffset(currentAngle, radius);
2832 currentAngle += deltaAngle;
2833
2834 me->SummonCreature(e.action.coneSummon.summonEntry, spawnPosition, spawnType, e.action.coneSummon.summonDuration);
2835 }
2836 }
2837
2838 break;
2839 }
2840 case SMART_ACTION_CU_ENCOUNTER_START:
2841 {
2842 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2843 {
2844 if (Player* playerTarget = target->ToPlayer())
2845 {
2846 playerTarget->RemoveArenaSpellCooldowns();
2847 playerTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(57724); // Spell Shaman Debuff - Sated (Heroism)
2848 playerTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(57723); // Spell Shaman Debuff - Exhaustion (Bloodlust)
2849 playerTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(2825); // Bloodlust
2850 playerTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(32182); // Heroism
2851 }
2852 }
2853
2854 break;
2855 }
2856 case SMART_ACTION_DO_ACTION:
2857 {
2858 int32 const actionId = e.action.doAction.isNegative ? -e.action.doAction.actionId : e.action.doAction.actionId;
2859 if (!e.action.doAction.instanceTarget)
2860 {
2861 if (targets.empty())
2862 break;
2863
2864 for (WorldObject* objTarget : targets)
2865 {
2866 if (Creature const* unitTarget = objTarget->ToCreature())
2867 {
2868 if (unitTarget->IsAIEnabled)
2869 {
2870 unitTarget->AI()->DoAction(actionId);
2871 }
2872 }
2873 else if (GameObject const* gobjTarget = objTarget->ToGameObject())
2874 {
2875 gobjTarget->AI()->DoAction(actionId);
2876 }
2877 }
2878
2879 }
2880 else
2881 {
2882 InstanceScript* instanceScript = nullptr;
2883 if (WorldObject* baseObj = GetBaseObject())
2884 {
2885 instanceScript = baseObj->GetInstanceScript();
2886 }
2887 // Action is triggered by AreaTrigger
2888 else if (trigger && IsPlayer(unit))
2889 {
2890 instanceScript = unit->GetInstanceScript();
2891 }
2892
2893 if (instanceScript)
2894 {
2895 instanceScript->DoAction(actionId);
2896 }
2897 }
2898 break;
2899 }
2900 case SMART_ACTION_DISABLE_EVADE:
2901 {
2902 if (!IsSmart())
2903 break;
2904
2905 CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetEvadeDisabled(e.action.disableEvade.disable != 0);
2906 break;
2907 }
2908 case SMART_ACTION_SET_CORPSE_DELAY:
2909 {
2910 for (WorldObject* const target : targets)
2911 {
2912 if (IsCreature(target))
2913 target->ToCreature()->SetCorpseDelay(e.action.corpseDelay.timer);
2914 }
2915 break;
2916 }
2917 case SMART_ACTION_SET_HEALTH_PCT:
2918 {
2919 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2920 if (Unit* targetUnit = target->ToUnit())
2921 targetUnit->SetHealth(targetUnit->CountPctFromMaxHealth(e.action.setHealthPct.percent));
2922 break;
2923 }
2924 case SMART_ACTION_SET_MOVEMENT_SPEED:
2925 {
2926 uint32 speedInteger = e.action.movementSpeed.speedInteger;
2927 uint32 speedFraction = e.action.movementSpeed.speedFraction;
2928 float speed = float(speedInteger) + float(speedFraction) / std::pow(10, std::floor(std::log10(float(speedFraction ? speedFraction : 1)) + 1));
2929
2930 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2931 if (IsCreature(target))
2932 target->ToCreature()->SetSpeed(UnitMoveType(e.action.movementSpeed.movementType), speed);
2933
2934 break;
2935 }
2936 case SMART_ACTION_PLAY_CINEMATIC:
2937 {
2938 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2939 {
2940 if (!IsPlayer(target))
2941 continue;
2942
2943 target->ToPlayer()->SendCinematicStart(e.action.cinematic.entry);
2944 }
2945 break;
2946 }
2947 case SMART_ACTION_SET_GUID:
2948 {
2949 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2950 {
2951 ObjectGuid guidToSend = me ? me->GetGUID() : go->GetGUID();
2952
2953 if (e.action.setGuid.invokerGUID)
2954 {
2955 if (WorldObject* invoker = GetLastInvoker())
2956 {
2957 guidToSend = invoker->GetGUID();
2958 }
2959 }
2960
2961 if (Creature* creature = target->ToCreature())
2962 {
2963 creature->AI()->SetGUID(guidToSend, e.action.setGuid.index);
2964 }
2965 else if (GameObject* object = target->ToGameObject())
2966 {
2967 object->AI()->SetGUID(guidToSend, e.action.setGuid.index);
2968 }
2969 }
2970 break;
2971 }
2972 case SMART_ACTION_SCRIPTED_SPAWN:
2973 {
2974 // Enable Scripted Spawns
2975 switch (e.action.scriptSpawn.state)
2976 {
2977 case 0: // Disable Respawn
2978 {
2979 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2980 {
2981 if (Creature* c = target->ToCreature())
2982 {
2983 CAST_AI(SmartAI, c->AI())->SetCanRespawn(false);
2984 if (!e.action.scriptSpawn.dontDespawn)
2985 c->DespawnOrUnsummon();
2986 }
2987 }
2988 break;
2989 }
2990 case 1: // Respawn Once
2991 {
2992 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
2993 {
2994 if (Creature* c = target->ToCreature())
2995 {
2996 CAST_AI(SmartAI, c->AI())->SetCanRespawn(true);
2997 c->Respawn(true);
2998 CAST_AI(SmartAI, c->AI())->SetCanRespawn(false);
2999 }
3000 }
3001 break;
3002 }
3003 case 2: // Enable Respawning
3004 {
3005 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
3006 {
3007 if (Creature* c = target->ToCreature())
3008 {
3009 CAST_AI(SmartAI, c->AI())->SetCanRespawn(true);
3010
3011 // If 0, respawn immediately
3012 if (e.action.scriptSpawn.spawnTimerMax)
3013 c->SetRespawnTime(urand(e.action.scriptSpawn.spawnTimerMin, e.action.scriptSpawn.spawnTimerMax));
3014 else
3015 c->Respawn(true);
3016
3017 // If 0, use DB values
3018 if (e.action.scriptSpawn.respawnDelay)
3019 c->SetRespawnDelay(e.action.scriptSpawn.respawnDelay);
3020
3021 // If 0, use default
3022 if (e.action.scriptSpawn.corpseDelay)
3023 c->SetCorpseDelay(e.action.scriptSpawn.corpseDelay);
3024 }
3025 }
3026 break;
3027 }
3028 default:
3029 break;
3030 }
3031 break;
3032 }
3033 case SMART_ACTION_SET_SCALE:
3034 {
3035 float scale = static_cast<float>(e.action.setScale.scale) / 100.0f;
3036
3037 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
3038 {
3039 if (IsUnit(target))
3040 {
3041 target->ToUnit()->SetObjectScale(scale);
3042 }
3043 }
3044 break;
3045 }
3046 case SMART_ACTION_SUMMON_RADIAL:
3047 {
3048 if (!me)
3049 break;
3050
3051 TempSummonType spawnType = (e.action.radialSummon.summonDuration > 0) ? TEMPSUMMON_TIMED_DESPAWN : TEMPSUMMON_CORPSE_DESPAWN;
3052
3053 float startAngle = me->GetOrientation() + (static_cast<float>(e.action.radialSummon.startAngle) * M_PI / 180.0f);
3054 float stepAngle = static_cast<float>(e.action.radialSummon.stepAngle) * M_PI / 180.0f;
3055
3056 if (e.action.radialSummon.dist)
3057 {
3058 for (uint32 itr = 0; itr < e.action.radialSummon.repetitions; itr++)
3059 {
3060 Position summonPos = me->GetPosition();
3061 summonPos.RelocatePolarOffset(itr * stepAngle, static_cast<float>(e.action.radialSummon.dist));
3062 me->SummonCreature(e.action.radialSummon.summonEntry, summonPos, spawnType, e.action.radialSummon.summonDuration);
3063 }
3064 break;
3065 }
3066
3067 for (uint32 itr = 0; itr < e.action.radialSummon.repetitions; itr++)
3068 {
3069 float currentAngle = startAngle + (itr * stepAngle);
3070 me->SummonCreature(e.action.radialSummon.summonEntry, me->GetPositionX(), me->GetPositionY(), me->GetPositionZ(), currentAngle, spawnType, e.action.radialSummon.summonDuration);
3071 }
3072
3073 break;
3074 }
3075 case SMART_ACTION_PLAY_SPELL_VISUAL:
3076 {
3077 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
3078 {
3079 if (IsUnit(target))
3080 {
3081 if (e.action.spellVisual.visualId)
3082 target->ToUnit()->SendPlaySpellVisual(e.action.spellVisual.visualId);
3083 }
3084 }
3085 break;
3086 }
3087 case SMART_ACTION_FOLLOW_GROUP:
3088 {
3089 if (!e.action.followGroup.followState)
3090 {
3091 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
3092 if (IsUnit(target))
3093 target->ToCreature()->GetMotionMaster()->MoveIdle();
3094
3095 break;
3096 }
3097
3098 uint8 membCount = targets.size();
3099 uint8 itr = 1;
3100 float dist = float(e.action.followGroup.dist / 100);
3101 switch (e.action.followGroup.followType)
3102 {
3103 case FOLLOW_TYPE_CIRCLE:
3104 {
3105 float angle = (membCount > 4 ? (M_PI * 2)/membCount : (M_PI / 2)); // 90 degrees is the maximum angle
3106 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
3107 {
3108 if (IsCreature(target))
3109 {
3110 target->ToCreature()->GetMotionMaster()->MoveFollow(me, dist, angle * itr);
3111 itr++;
3112 }
3113 }
3114 break;
3115 }
3116 case FOLLOW_TYPE_SEMI_CIRCLE_BEHIND:
3117 {
3118 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
3119 {
3120 if (IsCreature(target))
3121 {
3122 target->ToCreature()->GetMotionMaster()->MoveFollow(me, dist, (M_PI / 2.0f) + (M_PI / membCount) * (itr - 1));
3123 itr++;
3124 }
3125 }
3126 break;
3127 }
3128 case FOLLOW_TYPE_SEMI_CIRCLE_FRONT:
3129 {
3130 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
3131 {
3132 if (IsCreature(target))
3133 {
3134 target->ToCreature()->GetMotionMaster()->MoveFollow(me, dist, (M_PI + (M_PI / 2.0f) + (M_PI / membCount) * (itr - 1)));
3135 itr++;
3136 }
3137 }
3138 break;
3139 }
3140 case FOLLOW_TYPE_LINE:
3141 {
3142 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
3143 {
3144 if (IsCreature(target))
3145 {
3146 target->ToCreature()->GetMotionMaster()->MoveFollow(me, dist * (((itr - 1) / 2) + 1), itr % 2 ? 0.f : M_PI);
3147 itr++;
3148 }
3149 }
3150 break;
3151 }
3152 case FOLLOW_TYPE_COLUMN:
3153 {
3154 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
3155 {
3156 if (IsCreature(target))
3157 {
3158 target->ToCreature()->GetMotionMaster()->MoveFollow(me, dist * (((itr - 1) / 2) + 1), itr % 2 ? (M_PI / 2) : (M_PI * 1.5f));
3159 itr++;
3160 }
3161 }
3162 break;
3163 }
3164 case FOLLOW_TYPE_ANGULAR:
3165 {
3166 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
3167 {
3168 if (IsCreature(target))
3169 {
3170 target->ToCreature()->GetMotionMaster()->MoveFollow(me, dist * (((itr - 1) / 2) + 1), itr % 2 ? M_PI - (M_PI / 4) : M_PI + (M_PI / 4));
3171 itr++;
3172 }
3173 }
3174 break;
3175 }
3176 default:
3177 break;
3178 }
3179
3180 break;
3181 }
3182 case SMART_ACTION_SET_ORIENTATION_TARGET:
3183 {
3184 switch (e.action.orientationTarget.type)
3185 {
3186 case 0: // Reset
3187 {
3188 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
3189 target->ToCreature()->SetFacingTo((target->ToCreature()->HasUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_ONTRANSPORT) && target->ToCreature()->GetTransGUID() ? target->ToCreature()->GetTransportHomePosition() : target->ToCreature()->GetHomePosition()).GetOrientation());
3190
3191 break;
3192 }
3193 case 1: // Target target.o
3194 {
3195 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
3196 target->ToCreature()->SetFacingTo(e.target.o);
3197
3198 break;
3199 }
3200 case 2: // Target source
3201 {
3202 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
3203 target->ToCreature()->SetFacingToObject(me);
3204
3205 break;
3206 }
3207 case 3: // Target parameters
3208 {
3209 ObjectVector facingTargets;
3210 GetTargets(facingTargets, CreateSmartEvent(SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, (SMARTAI_TARGETS)e.action.orientationTarget.targetType, e.action.orientationTarget.targetParam1, e.action.orientationTarget.targetParam2, e.action.orientationTarget.targetParam3, e.action.orientationTarget.targetParam4, 0), unit);
3211
3212 for (WorldObject* facingTarget : facingTargets)
3213 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
3214 target->ToCreature()->SetFacingToObject(facingTarget);
3215
3216 break;
3217 }
3218 default:
3219 break;
3220 }
3221 break;
3222 }
3223 case SMART_ACTION_WAYPOINT_DATA_START:
3224 {
3225 if (e.action.wpData.pathId)
3226 {
3227 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
3228 {
3229 if (IsCreature(target))
3230 {
3231 target->ToCreature()->LoadPath(e.action.wpData.pathId);
3232 target->ToCreature()->GetMotionMaster()->MovePath(e.action.wpData.pathId, e.action.wpData.repeat);
3233 }
3234 }
3235 }
3236
3237 break;
3238 }
3239 case SMART_ACTION_WAYPOINT_DATA_RANDOM:
3240 {
3241 if (e.action.wpDataRandom.pathId1 && e.action.wpDataRandom.pathId2)
3242 {
3243 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
3244 {
3245 if (IsCreature(target))
3246 {
3247 uint32 path = urand(e.action.wpDataRandom.pathId1, e.action.wpDataRandom.pathId2);
3248 target->ToCreature()->LoadPath(path);
3249 target->ToCreature()->GetMotionMaster()->MovePath(path, e.action.wpDataRandom.repeat);
3250 }
3251 }
3252 }
3253
3254 break;
3255 }
3256 case SMART_ACTION_MOVEMENT_STOP:
3257 {
3258 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
3259 if (IsUnit(target))
3260 target->ToUnit()->StopMoving();
3261
3262 break;
3263 }
3264 case SMART_ACTION_MOVEMENT_PAUSE:
3265 {
3266 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
3267 if (IsUnit(target))
3268 target->ToUnit()->PauseMovement(e.action.move.timer);
3269
3270 break;
3271 }
3272 case SMART_ACTION_MOVEMENT_RESUME:
3273 {
3274 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
3275 if (IsUnit(target))
3276 target->ToUnit()->ResumeMovement(e.action.move.timer);
3277
3278 break;
3279 }
3280 case SMART_ACTION_WORLD_SCRIPT:
3281 {
3282 sWorldState->HandleExternalEvent(static_cast<WorldStateEvent>(e.action.worldStateScript.eventId), e.action.worldStateScript.param);
3283 break;
3284 }
3285 case SMART_ACTION_DISABLE_REWARD:
3286 {
3287 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
3288 if (IsCreature(target))
3289 {
3290 target->ToCreature()->SetReputationRewardDisabled(static_cast<bool>(e.action.reward.reputation));
3291 target->ToCreature()->SetLootRewardDisabled(static_cast<bool>(e.action.reward.loot));
3292 }
3293 break;
3294 }
3295 default:
3296 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: Entry {} SourceType {}, Event {}, Unhandled Action type {}", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType());
3297 break;
3298 }
3299
3300 if (e.link && e.link != e.event_id)
3301 {
3302 auto linked = FindLinkedEvent(e.link);
3303 if (linked.has_value() && linked.value().get().GetEventType() == SMART_EVENT_LINK)
3304 executionStack.emplace_back(SmartScriptFrame{ linked.value(), unit, var0, var1, bvar, spell, gob });
3305 else
3306 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: Entry {} SourceType {}, Event {}, Link Event {} not found or invalid, skipped.", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.link);
3307 }
3308}

SmartAction::wpDataRandom, SmartAction::wpPause, SmartAction::wps, SmartAction::wpStart, SmartAction::wpStop, SmartTarget::x, SmartTarget::y, and SmartTarget::z.

Referenced by ProcessEvent(), and ProcessTimedAction().

◆ ProcessEvent()

void SmartScript::ProcessEvent ( SmartScriptHolder &  e,
Unit *  unit = nullptr,
uint32  var0 = 0,
uint32  var1 = 0,
bool  bvar = false,
SpellInfo const *  spell = nullptr,
GameObject *  gob = nullptr 
)
4025{
4026 if (!e.active && e.GetEventType() != SMART_EVENT_LINK)
4027 return;
4028
4029 if ((e.event.event_phase_mask && !IsInPhase(e.event.event_phase_mask)) || ((e.event.event_flags & SMART_EVENT_FLAG_NOT_REPEATABLE) && e.runOnce))
4030 return;
4031
4032 if (!(e.event.event_flags & SMART_EVENT_FLAG_WHILE_CHARMED) && IsCharmedCreature(me))
4033 return;
4034
4035 switch (e.GetEventType())
4036 {
4037 case SMART_EVENT_LINK://special handling
4038 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0, var1, bvar, spell, gob);
4039 break;
4040 //called from Update tick
4041 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE:
4042 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax);
4043 break;
4044 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_OOC:
4045 if (me && me->IsEngaged())
4046 return;
4047 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax);
4048 break;
4049 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC:
4050 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged())
4051 return;
4052 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax);
4053 break;
4054 case SMART_EVENT_HEALTH_PCT:
4055 {
4056 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged() || !me->GetMaxHealth())
4057 return;
4058 uint32 perc = (uint32)me->GetHealthPct();
4059 if (perc > e.event.minMaxRepeat.max || perc < e.event.minMaxRepeat.min)
4060 return;
4061 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax);
4062 break;
4063 }
4064 case SMART_EVENT_TARGET_HEALTH_PCT:
4065 {
4066 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged() || !me->GetVictim() || !me->GetVictim()->GetMaxHealth())
4067 return;
4068 uint32 perc = (uint32)me->GetVictim()->GetHealthPct();
4069 if (perc > e.event.minMaxRepeat.max || perc < e.event.minMaxRepeat.min)
4070 return;
4071 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax, me->GetVictim());
4072 break;
4073 }
4074 case SMART_EVENT_MANA_PCT:
4075 {
4076 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged() || !me->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA))
4077 return;
4078 uint32 perc = uint32(me->GetPowerPct(POWER_MANA));
4079 if (perc > e.event.minMaxRepeat.max || perc < e.event.minMaxRepeat.min)
4080 return;
4081 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax);
4082 break;
4083 }
4084 case SMART_EVENT_TARGET_MANA_PCT:
4085 {
4086 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged() || !me->GetVictim() || !me->GetVictim()->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA))
4087 return;
4088 uint32 perc = uint32(me->GetVictim()->GetPowerPct(POWER_MANA));
4089 if (perc > e.event.minMaxRepeat.max || perc < e.event.minMaxRepeat.min)
4090 return;
4091 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax, me->GetVictim());
4092 break;
4093 }
4094 case SMART_EVENT_RANGE:
4095 {
4096 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged() || !me->GetVictim())
4097 return;
4098
4099 if (me->IsInRange(me->GetVictim(), (float)e.event.minMaxRepeat.rangeMin, (float)e.event.minMaxRepeat.rangeMax))
4100 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax, me->GetVictim());
4101 else
4102 RecalcTimer(e, 1200, 1200); // make it predictable
4103
4104 break;
4105 }
4106 case SMART_EVENT_VICTIM_CASTING:
4107 {
4108 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged())
4109 return;
4110
4111 Unit* victim = me->GetVictim();
4112
4113 if (!victim || !victim->IsNonMeleeSpellCast(false, false, true))
4114 return;
4115
4116 if (e.event.targetCasting.spellId > 0)
4117 if (Spell* currSpell = victim->GetCurrentSpell(CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL))
4118 if (currSpell->m_spellInfo->Id != e.event.targetCasting.spellId)
4119 return;
4120
4121 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.targetCasting.repeatMin, e.event.targetCasting.repeatMax, me->GetVictim());
4122 break;
4123 }
4124 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_HEALTH:
4125 {
4126 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged())
4127 return;
4128
4129 Unit* target = DoSelectLowestHpFriendly((float)e.event.friendlyHealth.radius, e.event.friendlyHealth.hpDeficit);
4130 if (!target || !target->IsInCombat())
4131 {
4132 // Xinef: if there are at least two same npcs, they will perform the same action immediately even if this is useless...
4133 RecalcTimer(e, 1000, 3000);
4134 return;
4135 }
4136 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.friendlyHealth.repeatMin, e.event.friendlyHealth.repeatMax, target);
4137 break;
4138 }
4139 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_IS_CC:
4140 {
4141 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged())
4142 return;
4143
4144 std::vector<Creature*> creatures;
4145 DoFindFriendlyCC(creatures, float(e.event.friendlyCC.radius));
4146 if (creatures.empty())
4147 {
4148 // Xinef: if there are at least two same npcs, they will perform the same action immediately even if this is useless...
4149 RecalcTimer(e, 1000, 3000);
4150 return;
4151 }
4152 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.friendlyCC.repeatMin, e.event.friendlyCC.repeatMax, Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(creatures));
4153 break;
4154 }
4155 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_MISSING_BUFF:
4156 {
4157 if (e.event.missingBuff.onlyInCombat && !me->IsEngaged())
4158 {
4159 return;
4160 }
4161
4162 std::vector<Creature*> creatures;
4163 DoFindFriendlyMissingBuff(creatures, float(e.event.missingBuff.radius), e.event.missingBuff.spell);
4164
4165 if (creatures.empty())
4166 return;
4167
4168 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.missingBuff.repeatMin, e.event.missingBuff.repeatMax, Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(creatures));
4169 break;
4170 }
4171 case SMART_EVENT_HAS_AURA:
4172 {
4173 if (!me)
4174 return;
4175 uint32 count = me->GetAuraCount(e.event.aura.spell);
4176 if ((!e.event.aura.count && !count) || (e.event.aura.count && count >= e.event.aura.count))
4177 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.aura.repeatMin, e.event.aura.repeatMax);
4178 break;
4179 }
4180 case SMART_EVENT_TARGET_BUFFED:
4181 {
4182 if (!me || !me->GetVictim())
4183 return;
4184 uint32 count = me->GetVictim()->GetAuraCount(e.event.aura.spell);
4185 if (count < e.event.aura.count)
4186 return;
4187 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.aura.repeatMin, e.event.aura.repeatMax, me->GetVictim());
4188 break;
4189 }
4190 case SMART_EVENT_CHARMED:
4191 {
4192 if (bvar == (e.event.charm.onRemove != 1))
4193 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0, var1, bvar, spell, gob);
4194 break;
4195 }
4196 //no params

4198 case SMART_EVENT_DEATH:

4221 {
4222 case 0:
4223 // no filter set, always execute action
4224 break;
4225 case 1:
4226 // GossipHello only filter set, skip action if reportUse
4227 if (var0)
4228 {
4229 return;
4230 }
4231 break;
4232 case 2:
4233 // reportUse only filter set, skip action if GossipHello
4234 if (!var0)
4235 {
4236 return;
4237 }
4238 break;
4239 default:
4240 // Ignore any other value
4241 break;
4242 }
4243
4244 ProcessAction(e, unit, var0, var1, bvar, spell, gob);
4245 break;
4246 case SMART_EVENT_IS_BEHIND_TARGET:
4247 {
4248 if (!me)
4249 return;
4250

4252 {
4253 if (e.event.minMaxRepeat.rangeMax && (me->IsInRange(victim, (float)e.event.minMaxRepeat.rangeMin, (float)e.event.minMaxRepeat.rangeMax)))
4254 if (!victim->HasInArc(static_cast<float>(M_PI), me))
4255 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax, victim);
4256 }
4257
4258 break;
4259 }
4260 case SMART_EVENT_IS_IN_MELEE_RANGE:
4261 {
4262 if (!me)
4263 return;

4265 if (Unit* victim = me->GetVictim())
4266 if ((!e.event.meleeRange.invert && me->IsWithinMeleeRange(victim, static_cast<float>(e.event.meleeRange.dist))) ||
4267 (e.event.meleeRange.invert && !me->IsWithinMeleeRange(victim, static_cast<float>(e.event.meleeRange.dist))))
4268 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax, victim);
4269
4270 break;
4271 }
4272 case SMART_EVENT_RECEIVE_EMOTE:

4275 ProcessAction(e, unit);
4276 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.emote.cooldownMin, e.event.emote.cooldownMax);

4278 break;
4279 case SMART_EVENT_KILL:
4280 {
4281 if (!me || !unit)
4282 return;
4283 if (e.event.kill.playerOnly && !unit->IsPlayer())
4284 return;

4292 case SMART_EVENT_SPELLHIT:
4293 {

4295 return;

4304 case SMART_EVENT_OOC_LOS:
4305 {
4306 if (!me || me->IsEngaged())
4307 return;
4308 //can trigger if closer than fMaxAllowedRange
4309 float range = (float)e.event.los.maxDist;
4310
4311 //if range is ok and we are actually in LOS
4312 if (me->IsWithinDistInMap(unit, range) && me->IsWithinLOSInMap(unit))
4313 {
4314 SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode hostilityMode = static_cast<SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode>(e.event.los.hostilityMode);
4315 //if friendly event&&who is not hostile OR hostile event&&who is hostile
4316 if ((hostilityMode == SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode::Any) ||
4317 (hostilityMode == SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode::NotHostile && !me->IsHostileTo(unit)) ||
4318 (hostilityMode == SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode::Hostile && me->IsHostileTo(unit)))
4319 {
4320 if (e.event.los.playerOnly && !unit->IsPlayer())
4321 return;
4322 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.los.cooldownMin, e.event.los.cooldownMax);
4323 ProcessAction(e, unit);
4324 }
4325 }
4326 break;
4327 }
4328 case SMART_EVENT_IC_LOS:
4329 {
4330 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged())
4331 return;
4332 //can trigger if closer than fMaxAllowedRange
4333 float range = (float)e.event.los.maxDist;
4334
4335 //if range is ok and we are actually in LOS
4336 if (me->IsWithinDistInMap(unit, range) && me->IsWithinLOSInMap(unit))
4337 {
4338 SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode hostilityMode = static_cast<SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode>(e.event.los.hostilityMode);
4339 //if friendly event&&who is not hostile OR hostile event&&who is hostile
4340 if ((hostilityMode == SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode::Any) ||
4341 (hostilityMode == SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode::NotHostile && !me->IsHostileTo(unit)) ||
4342 (hostilityMode == SmartEvent::LOSHostilityMode::Hostile && me->IsHostileTo(unit)))
4343 {

4532 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_HEALTH_PCT:
4533 {
4534 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged())
4535 return;
4536
4537 Unit* unitTarget = nullptr;
4538 switch (e.GetTargetType())
4539 {
4540 case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_RANGE:
4541 case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_GUID:
4542 case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_DISTANCE:
4543 case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_CREATURE:
4544 case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_PLAYER:
4545 case SMART_TARGET_PLAYER_RANGE:
4546 case SMART_TARGET_PLAYER_DISTANCE:
4547 {
4548 ObjectVector targets;
4549 GetTargets(targets, e);
4550 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
4551 {
4552 if (IsUnit(target) && me->IsFriendlyTo(target->ToUnit()) && target->ToUnit()->IsAlive() && target->ToUnit()->IsInCombat())
4553 {
4554 uint32 healthPct = uint32(target->ToUnit()->GetHealthPct());
4555 if (healthPct > e.event.friendlyHealthPct.hpPct)
4556 {
4557 continue;
4558 }
4559
4560 unitTarget = target->ToUnit();
4561 break;
4562 }
4563 }
4564
4565 break;
4566 }
4567 case SMART_TARGET_SELF:
4568 case SMART_TARGET_ACTION_INVOKER:
4569 unitTarget = DoSelectLowestHpPercentFriendly((float)e.event.friendlyHealthPct.radius, 0, e.event.friendlyHealthPct.hpPct);
4570 break;
4571 default:
4572 return;
4573 }
4574
4575 if (!unitTarget)
4576 return;
4577
4578 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.friendlyHealthPct.repeatMin, e.event.friendlyHealthPct.repeatMax, unitTarget);
4579 break;
4580 }
4581 case SMART_EVENT_DISTANCE_CREATURE:
4582 {
4583 if (!me)
4584 return;
4585
4586 WorldObject* creature = nullptr;
4587
4588 if (e.event.distance.guid != 0)
4589 {
4590 creature = FindCreatureNear(me, e.event.distance.guid);
4591
4592 if (!creature)
4593 return;
4594
4595 if (!me->IsInRange(creature, 0, (float)e.event.distance.dist))
4596 return;
4597 }
4598 else if (e.event.distance.entry != 0)
4599 {
4600 std::list<Creature*> list;
4601 me->GetCreatureListWithEntryInGrid(list, e.event.distance.entry, (float)e.event.distance.dist);
4602
4603 if (!list.empty())
4604 creature = list.front();
4605 }
4606
4607 if (creature)
4608 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.distance.repeat, e.event.distance.repeat);
4609
4610 break;
4611 }
4612 case SMART_EVENT_DISTANCE_GAMEOBJECT:
4613 {
4614 if (!me)
4615 return;
4616
4617 WorldObject* gameobject = nullptr;
4618
4619 if (e.event.distance.guid != 0)
4620 {
4621 gameobject = FindGameObjectNear(me, e.event.distance.guid);
4622
4623 if (!gameobject)
4624 return;
4625
4626 if (!me->IsInRange(gameobject, 0, (float)e.event.distance.dist))
4627 return;
4628 }
4629 else if (e.event.distance.entry != 0)
4630 {
4631 std::list<GameObject*> list;
4632 me->GetGameObjectListWithEntryInGrid(list, e.event.distance.entry, (float)e.event.distance.dist);
4633
4634 if (!list.empty())
4635 gameobject = list.front();
4636 }
4637
4638 if (gameobject)
4639 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.distance.repeat, e.event.distance.repeat);
4640
4641 break;
4642 }
4643 case SMART_EVENT_COUNTER_SET:
4644 if (e.event.counter.id != var0 || GetCounterValue(e.event.counter.id) != e.event.counter.value)
4645 return;
4646
4647 ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.counter.cooldownMin, e.event.counter.cooldownMax);
4648 break;
4649 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_PLAYERS:
4650 {
4651 uint32 playerCount = 0;
4652 ObjectVector targets;
4653 GetWorldObjectsInDist(targets, static_cast<float>(e.event.nearPlayer.radius));
4654
4655 if (!targets.empty())
4656 {
4657 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
4658 {
4659 if (IsPlayer(target))
4660 playerCount++;
4661 }
4662 if (playerCount >= e.event.nearPlayer.minCount)
4663 ProcessAction(e, unit);
4664 }
4665 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.nearPlayer.repeatMin, e.event.nearPlayer.repeatMax);
4666 break;
4667 }
4668 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_PLAYERS_NEGATION:
4669 {
4670 uint32 playerCount = 0;
4671 ObjectVector targets;
4672 GetWorldObjectsInDist(targets, static_cast<float>(e.event.nearPlayerNegation.radius));
4673
4674 if (!targets.empty())
4675 {
4676 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
4677 {
4678 if (IsPlayer(target))
4679 playerCount++;
4680 }
4681
4682 if (playerCount < e.event.nearPlayerNegation.maxCount)
4683 ProcessAction(e, unit);
4684 }
4685 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.nearPlayerNegation.repeatMin, e.event.nearPlayerNegation.repeatMax);
4686 break;
4687 }
4688 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_UNIT:
4689 {
4690 uint32 unitCount = 0;
4691 ObjectVector targets;
4692 GetWorldObjectsInDist(targets, static_cast<float>(e.event.nearUnit.range));
4693
4694 if (!targets.empty())
4695 {
4696 if (e.event.nearUnit.type)
4697 {
4698 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
4699 {
4700 if (IsGameObject(target) && target->GetEntry() == e.event.nearUnit.entry)
4701 unitCount++;
4702 }
4703 }
4704 else
4705 {
4706 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
4707 {
4708 if (IsCreature(target) && target->GetEntry() == e.event.nearUnit.entry)
4709 unitCount++;
4710 }
4711 }
4712
4713 if (unitCount >= e.event.nearUnit.count)
4714 ProcessAction(e, unit);
4715 }
4716 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.nearUnit.timer, e.event.nearUnit.timer);
4717 break;
4718 }
4719 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_UNIT_NEGATION:
4720 {
4721 uint32 unitCount = 0;
4722 ObjectVector targets;
4723 GetWorldObjectsInDist(targets, static_cast<float>(e.event.nearUnitNegation.range));
4724
4725 if (!targets.empty())
4726 {
4727 if (e.event.nearUnitNegation.type)
4728 {
4729 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
4730 {
4731 if (IsGameObject(target) && target->GetEntry() == e.event.nearUnitNegation.entry)
4732 unitCount++;
4733 }
4734 }
4735 else
4736 {
4737 for (WorldObject* target : targets)
4738 {
4739 if (IsCreature(target) && target->GetEntry() == e.event.nearUnitNegation.entry)
4740 unitCount++;
4741 }
4742 }
4743
4744 if (unitCount < e.event.nearUnitNegation.count)
4745 ProcessAction(e, unit);
4746 }
4747 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.nearUnitNegation.timer, e.event.nearUnitNegation.timer);
4748 break;
4749 }
4750 case SMART_EVENT_AREA_CASTING:
4751 {
4752 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged())
4753 return;
4754
4755 ThreatContainer::StorageType threatList = me->GetThreatMgr().GetThreatList();
4756 for (ThreatContainer::StorageType::const_iterator i = threatList.begin(); i != threatList.end(); ++i)
4757 {
4758 if (Unit* target = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*me, (*i)->getUnitGuid()))
4759 {
4760 if (!target || !IsPlayer(target) || !target->IsNonMeleeSpellCast(false, false, true))
4761 continue;
4762
4763 if (!(me->IsInRange(target, (float)e.event.minMaxRepeat.rangeMin, (float)e.event.minMaxRepeat.rangeMax)))
4764 continue;
4765
4766 ProcessAction(e, target);
4767 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax);
4768 return;
4769 }
4770
4771 // If no targets are found and it's off cooldown, check again in 1200ms
4772 RecalcTimer(e, 1200, 1200);
4773 break;
4774 }
4775
4776 break;
4777 }
4778 case SMART_EVENT_AREA_RANGE:
4779 {
4780 if (!me || !me->IsEngaged())
4781 return;
4782
4783 ThreatContainer::StorageType threatList = me->GetThreatMgr().GetThreatList();
4784 for (ThreatContainer::StorageType::const_iterator i = threatList.begin(); i != threatList.end(); ++i)
4785 {
4786 if (Unit* target = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*me, (*i)->getUnitGuid()))
4787 {
4788 if (!(me->IsInRange(target, (float)e.event.minMaxRepeat.rangeMin, (float)e.event.minMaxRepeat.rangeMax)))
4789 continue;
4790
4791 ProcessAction(e, target);
4792 RecalcTimer(e, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin, e.event.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax);
4793 return;
4794 }
4795 }
4796
4797 // If no targets are found and it's off cooldown, check again
4798 RecalcTimer(e, 1200, 1200);
4799 break;
4800 }
4801 case SMART_EVENT_WAYPOINT_DATA_REACHED:
4802 case SMART_EVENT_WAYPOINT_DATA_ENDED:
4803 {
4804 if (!me || (e.event.wpData.pointId && var0 != e.event.wpData.pointId) || (e.event.wpData.pathId && me->GetWaypointPath() != e.event.wpData.pathId))
4805 return;
4806 ProcessAction(e, unit);
4807 break;
4808 }
4809 default:
4810 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessEvent: Unhandled Event type {}", e.GetEventType());
4811 break;
4812 }
4813}
SMART_EVENT_FLAG_WHILE_CHARMED
@ SMART_EVENT_FLAG_WHILE_CHARMED

◆ ProcessEventsFor()

void SmartScript::ProcessEventsFor ( SMART_EVENT  e,
Unit *  unit = nullptr,
uint32  var0 = 0,
uint32  var1 = 0,
bool  bvar = false,
SpellInfo const *  spell = nullptr,
GameObject *  gob = nullptr 
)
136{
137 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = mEvents.begin(); i != mEvents.end(); ++i)
138 {
139 SMART_EVENT eventType = SMART_EVENT((*i).GetEventType());
140 if (eventType == SMART_EVENT_LINK)//special handling
141 continue;
142
143 if (eventType == e)
144 {
145 ConditionList conds = sConditionMgr->GetConditionsForSmartEvent((*i).entryOrGuid, (*i).event_id, (*i).source_type);
146 ConditionSourceInfo info = ConditionSourceInfo(unit, GetBaseObject(), me ? me->GetVictim() : nullptr);
147
148 if (sConditionMgr->IsObjectMeetToConditions(info, conds))
149 {
150 ASSERT(executionStack.empty());
151 executionStack.emplace_back(SmartScriptFrame{ *i, unit, var0, var1, bvar, spell, gob });
152 while (!executionStack.empty())
153 {
154 auto [stack_holder , stack_unit, stack_var0, stack_var1, stack_bvar, stack_spell, stack_gob] = executionStack.back();
155 executionStack.pop_back();
156 ProcessEvent(stack_holder, stack_unit, stack_var0, stack_var1, stack_bvar, stack_spell, stack_gob);
157 }
158 }
159 }
160 }
161}

3311{

◆ ResetBaseObject()

void SmartScript::ResetBaseObject ( )
inline
167 {
168 WorldObject* lookupRoot = me;
169 if (!lookupRoot)
170 lookupRoot = go;
171
172 if (lookupRoot)
173 {
174 if (meOrigGUID)
175 {
176 if (Creature* m = ObjectAccessor::GetCreature(*lookupRoot, meOrigGUID))
177 {
178 me = m;
179 go = nullptr;
180 }
181 }
182
183 if (goOrigGUID)
184 {
185 if (GameObject* o = ObjectAccessor::GetGameObject(*lookupRoot, goOrigGUID))
186 {
187 me = nullptr;
188 go = o;
189 }
190 }
191 }
192
193 goOrigGUID.Clear();
194 meOrigGUID.Clear();
195 }

◆ RetryLater()

void SmartScript::RetryLater ( SmartScriptHolder &  e,
bool  ignoreChanceRoll = false 
)
private
5062{
5063 RaisePriority(e);
5064
5065 // This allows to retry the action later without rolling again the chance roll (which might fail and end up not executing the action)
5066 if (ignoreChanceRoll)
5067 e.event.event_flags |= SMART_EVENT_FLAG_TEMP_IGNORE_CHANCE_ROLL;
5068
5069 e.runOnce = false;
5070}

◆ SetScript9()

void SmartScript::SetScript9 ( SmartScriptHolder &  e,
uint32  entry 
)
5297{
5298 //do NOT clear mTimedActionList if it's being iterated because it will invalidate the iterator and delete
5299 // any SmartScriptHolder contained like the "e" parameter passed to this function
5300 if (isProcessingTimedActionList)
5301 {
5302 LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "Entry {} SourceType {} Event {} Action {} is trying to overwrite timed action list from a timed action, this is not allowed!.", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.GetEventType(), e.GetActionType());
5303 return;
5304 }
5305
5306 // Do NOT allow to start a new actionlist if a previous one is already running, unless explicitly allowed. We need to always finish the current actionlist
5307 if (!e.action.timedActionList.allowOverride && !mTimedActionList.empty())
5308 {
5309 return;
5310 }
5311
5312 mTimedActionList.clear();
5313 mTimedActionList = sSmartScriptMgr->GetScript(entry, SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_TIMED_ACTIONLIST);
5314 if (mTimedActionList.empty())
5315 return;
5316 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = mTimedActionList.begin(); i != mTimedActionList.end(); ++i)
5317 {
5318 i->enableTimed = i == mTimedActionList.begin();//enable processing only for the first action
5319
5320 if (e.action.timedActionList.timerType == 0)
5321 i->event.type = SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_OOC;
5322 else if (e.action.timedActionList.timerType == 1)
5323 i->event.type = SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC;
5324 else if (e.action.timedActionList.timerType > 1)
5325 i->event.type = SMART_EVENT_UPDATE;
5326
5327 InitTimer((*i));
5328 }
5329}

◆ StoreCounter()

void SmartScript::StoreCounter ( uint32  id,
uint32  value,
uint32  reset,
uint32  subtract 
)
inline
109 {
110 CounterMap::iterator itr = mCounterList.find(id);
111 if (itr != mCounterList.end())
112 {
113 if (!reset && !subtract)
114 {
115 itr->second += value;
116 }
117 else if (subtract)
118 {
119 itr->second -= value;
120 }
121 else
122 {
123 itr->second = value;
124 }
125 }
126 else
127 {
128 mCounterList.insert(std::make_pair(id, value));
129 }
130
131 ProcessEventsFor(SMART_EVENT_COUNTER_SET, nullptr, id);
132 }

References mCounterList, ProcessEventsFor(), and SMART_EVENT_COUNTER_SET.

◆ UpdateTimer()

void SmartScript::UpdateTimer ( SmartScriptHolder &  e,
uint32 const  diff 
)
4856{
4857 if (e.GetEventType() == SMART_EVENT_LINK)
4858 return;
4859
4860 if (e.event.event_phase_mask && !IsInPhase(e.event.event_phase_mask))
4861 return;
4862
4863 if (e.GetEventType() == SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC && (!me || !me->IsEngaged()))
4864 return;
4865
4866 if (e.GetEventType() == SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_OOC && (me && me->IsEngaged()))//can be used with me=nullptr (go script)
4867 return;
4868
4869 if (e.timer < diff)
4870 {
4871 // delay spell cast for another AI tick if another spell is being cast
4872 if (e.GetActionType() == SMART_ACTION_CAST)
4873 {
4874 if (!(e.action.cast.castFlags & SMARTCAST_INTERRUPT_PREVIOUS))
4875 {
4876 if (me && me->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING))
4877 {
4878 RaisePriority(e);
4879 return;
4880 }
4881 }
4882 }
4883
4884 // Delay flee for assist event if casting
4885 if (e.GetActionType() == SMART_ACTION_FLEE_FOR_ASSIST && me && me->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING))
4886 {
4887 e.timer = 1200;
4888 return;
4889 } // @TODO: Can't these be handled by the action themselves instead? Less expensive
4890
4891 e.active = true;//activate events with cooldown
4892 switch (e.GetEventType())//process ONLY timed events
4893 {
4894 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_PLAYERS:
4895 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_PLAYERS_NEGATION:
4896 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_UNIT:
4897 case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_UNIT_NEGATION:
4898 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE:
4899 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_OOC:
4900 case SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC:
4901 case SMART_EVENT_HEALTH_PCT:
4902 case SMART_EVENT_TARGET_HEALTH_PCT:
4903 case SMART_EVENT_MANA_PCT:
4904 case SMART_EVENT_TARGET_MANA_PCT:
4905 case SMART_EVENT_RANGE:
4906 case SMART_EVENT_AREA_RANGE:
4907 case SMART_EVENT_VICTIM_CASTING:
4908 case SMART_EVENT_AREA_CASTING:
4909 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_HEALTH:
4910 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_IS_CC:
4911 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_MISSING_BUFF:
4912 case SMART_EVENT_HAS_AURA:
4913 case SMART_EVENT_TARGET_BUFFED:
4914 case SMART_EVENT_IS_BEHIND_TARGET:
4915 case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_HEALTH_PCT:
4916 case SMART_EVENT_DISTANCE_CREATURE:
4917 case SMART_EVENT_DISTANCE_GAMEOBJECT:
4918 case SMART_EVENT_IS_IN_MELEE_RANGE:
4919 {
4920 ASSERT(executionStack.empty());
4921 executionStack.emplace_back(SmartScriptFrame{ e, nullptr, 0, 0, false, nullptr, nullptr });
4922 while (!executionStack.empty())
4923 {
4924 auto [stack_holder, stack_unit, stack_var0, stack_var1, stack_bvar, stack_spell, stack_gob] = executionStack.back();
4925 executionStack.pop_back();
4926 ProcessEvent(stack_holder, stack_unit, stack_var0, stack_var1, stack_bvar, stack_spell, stack_gob);
4927 }
4928 if (e.GetScriptType() == SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_TIMED_ACTIONLIST)
4929 {
4930 e.enableTimed = false;//disable event if it is in an ActionList and was processed once
4931 for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = mTimedActionList.begin(); i != mTimedActionList.end(); ++i)
4932 {
4933 //find the first event which is not the current one and enable it
4934 if (i->event_id > e.event_id)
4935 {
4936 i->enableTimed = true;
4937 break;
4938 }
4939 }
4940 }
4941 break;
4942 }
4943 }
4944
4945 if (e.priority != SmartScriptHolder::DEFAULT_PRIORITY)
4946 {
4947 // Reset priority to default one only if the event hasn't been rescheduled again to next loop
4948 if (e.timer > 1)
4949 {
4950 // Re-sort events if this was moved to the top of the queue
4951 mEventSortingRequired = true;
4952 // Reset priority to default one
4953 e.priority = SmartScriptHolder::DEFAULT_PRIORITY;
4954 }
4955 }
4956 }
4957 else
4958 e.timer -= diff;
4959}
UNIT_STATE_CASTING
@ UNIT_STATE_CASTING
Definition UnitDefines.h:185
SmartScriptHolder::enableTimed
bool enableTimed
